node.usp1:
If you're looking to perform at your best, the Reebok 7ft Olympic Bar is the ideal choice, delivering consistent whip and spin necessary for serious lifting.

Rigorously tested for comfort, grip, quality and durability, the Olympic barbell features rotating bar ends with smooth action, enabling you to get under the bar as smoothly as possible for snatches and cleans, and medium knurled hand grip areas for greater control.

Weighing 20kg unloaded, the 50mm diameter barbell in itself is an essential piece of weightlifting equipment. Though if you're looking for a greater challenge, Reebok Olympic Weight Plates of varying sizes can easily be loaded onto the bar using the included steel collars to secure them into place.
node.bulletpoints: 50mm diameter sleeves for Olympic weight plates - 300kg maximum weight limit, Brass bushings, Medium knurled hand grip areas, Reebok 7ft Olympic Bar - 20kg unloaded bar weight, Rotating bar ends with smooth action, Steel collars included to secure weight plates

node.usp1:
The Reebok Olympic Hex Bar is the ideal piece of functional weight training equipment for shrugs, deadlifts and farmers walk, allowing for a greater range of motion through every lift.

Conventionally referred to as a trap bar, Reebok's new Hex shaped version features an 8" loadable sleeve space, plus 50mm diameter sleeves for adding Olympic weight plates which can be secured using the steel collars included.

With a centred load, the Reebok Hex Bar puts significantly less stress on the spine than a traditional barbell deadlift would, as the user can get into their start position of a deadlift without rounding their back.

Whether you're a seasoned lifter or beginner, the Reebok Hex Bar is an effective tool for building maximum power and executing a large number of dead lift exercises.
node.bulletpoints: 50mm diameter sleeves for Olympic weight plates, 8" loadable sleeve space (excluding collar), Allows for greater range of motion without infringing, Reebok Olympic Hex Bar ideal for shrugs, deadlifts, farmers walk, Steel collars included to secure weight plates

node.usp1:
The Reebok Lifting Straps from the Functional range help you improve your grip for heavier weightlifting sessions. With added padding on the inside of the wrist, the straps provide ultimate comfort so you can focus more on your lift, plus, the increased width of the strap reduces further friction on the wrist.

Designed for prolonged, heavy-duty use, the Reebok Lifting Straps enable you to get a solid lock on the barbell and easily release post-set.

Where your grip is hindering your performance, the Lifting Straps from Reebok are a reliable weightlifting accessory to give you the edge you need to beat your personal best.
node.bulletpoints: Added padding on inside of wrist for extra comfort, Increased width reduces friction on wrist, Reebok Lifting Straps - Helps to improve grip for heavier lifts

node.usp1:
Comfortable, adjustable and secure, the pair of 0.5kg grey and blue wrist weights from the Reebok Women's Training range feature a unique thumb sleeve as well as an easily adjustable hook and loop closure.

Whether you're walking, jogging or running, the wrist weights are the perfect fitness accessory to add dimension to your workout and push you to the extra level with an added calorie burn.

The Reebok wrist weights are also available in 1kg and 1.5kg (sold separately), so you can build upon your strength training, adding a subtle but noticeable amount of weight.
node.bulletpoints: Adjustable Circumference : Minimum 14.cm - Maximum 20cm, Also available in 1kg and 1.5kg (sold separately), Comfortable thumb sleeve, Easily adjustable hook and loop closure, Ideal for adding extra weight to your workout, Pair of 0.5kg grey and blue wrist weights from the Reebok Women's Training range

node.usp1:
Ideal for those looking to add core-specific strengthening to their functional training regime, the Reebok Ab Wedge Mat effectively isolates the abs for the perfect crunch. The raised 'wedge' shape surface means the user must apply greater force to propel their crunch move forward for a full range of motion through the abdominal muscle group.

The premium ab mat noticeably relieves any lower back tension and pressure during sit-up exercises as it is designed to the natural curvature of the spine. The Reebok mat's flat, non-slip base keeps it in place throughout movement and the high density foam construction keeps it firm for prolonged use.

Suitable for everyone, every size and shape, the Reebok Ab Wedge Mat is a compact, portable workout tool that can be taken anywhere.
node.bulletpoints: Designed to the natural curvature of the spine, Flat, non-slip base, High density foam with easy wipe clean surface, Reebok Ab Wedge Mat isolates abs for perfect crunch

node.usp1:
The heavy-duty Tri-Fold Mat from the Reebok Functional range is suitable for a wide variety of exercises and stretches, providing excellent support and protection throughout your workout thanks to its 1.5" thick foam construction.

60cm x 180cm when folded out, the padded Reebok Mat is made with reinforced PVC material which is easy to clean after use and its ingenious tri-fold design with integrated handles allows for space efficient storage and transportation convenience.
node.bulletpoints: Dimensions: 60 x 180cm, Easy wipe clean PVC surface, Integrated carry handles for easy transportation, Reebok Tri-Fold Mat made with 1.5" thick foam

node.usp1:
Essential for your functional training regime, the heavy-duty Reebok Functional Mat is the tried and tested option.

173 x 61cm and 0.8cm thick, the Reebok fitness mat provides a comfortable surface for all types of exercises and stretches with a ridged underside for additional grip. Plus it features a textured non-slip workout surface which is easy to wipe down after use. Specific design attributes of the mat include the Reebok logo prominent in the centre of the mat with loops to the top for hanging to the wall.
node.bulletpoints: 8mm thickness, Dimensions: 173 x 61 x 0.8cm, Easy wipe clean surface, Reebok Functional Mat with textured non-slip workout surface, Ridged underside for additional grip

node.usp1:
The bottom line is - if you want to maintain mobility, improve flexibility and stay injury-free, then stretching is fundamental. Some might say it's equally important as the exercise itself.

The 0.6cm thick adidas Stretch Mat provides a padded, soft surface area of 183 x 61cm to carry out your stretches comfortably.

Easy to roll up, the adidas mat has been designed with 10 instructional stretches printed directly onto the mat, so follow these to ensure you don't miss a vital stretch.
node.bulletpoints: 10 instructional stretches printed onto the mat, 183 x 61 x 0.6cm, Easy to roll up and clear, Soft, comfortable stretching surface

node.usp1:
Reebok Floor Guards - ideal for at-home training.

Protect your floor from scratches and damages when weight training at home with the Reebok Floor Guards. Whether you're using weights or cardiovascular machines such as cross trainers, exercise bikes or treadmills, this pack of 4 floor guards with interlocking edge trim cover a substantial surface area of 120cm x 120cm (each individual guard measures 61cm x 61cm).

The non-slip floor mats slot together with minimal effort.
node.bulletpoints: High density construction protects flooring, Interlocking 61x61cm mats, Pack of 4 with edge trim

node.usp1:
Love fitness? Love your mat.

An exercise mat is a staple accessory for any keen fitness enthusiast, 'Yogi' or Pilates fan, but with so many shapes and sizes available, it can be challenging to choose the right one for your needs.

Made for floor based activities which help develop strength, posture and flexibility, the stylish 'Love Fitness' mat from Reebok, 173 x 61cm in size and 4mm in thickness, provides a comfortable, cushioned surface for your back, hands and feet when performing every type of move.

Thanks to the Reebok fitness mat's non-slip textured design, you'll move seamlessly through your aerobic moves as the trusty mat will remain exactly where you placed it at the beginning of your workout.

If you're looking to make a bold statement acclaiming your devotion to fitness, then the blue and white Reebok fitness mat is a stylish, yet practical choice.
node.bulletpoints: Blue 'Love Fitness' exercise mat from the Reebok Women's Training range, Blue/White with printed 'Love Fitness' slogan, Ideal for stretching and general fitness, Non-slip textured design, Provides a comfortable, cushioned exercise surface area of 173 x 61cm, 4mm thickness

The 8mm thick Reebok training mat with bold diamond detailing, provides a comfortable, cushioned and larger surface area of 183cm x 61cm for all types of bodyweight strength exercises such as press ups, planks or spidermans.

Its non-slip design ensures it remains in the same position throughout your full workout.
node.bulletpoints: 183 x 61cm, 8mm thickness, Comfortable foam training surface ideal for stretching and strength exercises, Non-slip textured design, Packaged with shoulder carrying strap

The 6mm thickness of the adidas solid grey Fitness Mat makes for a more comfortable warm up and cool down whilst its textured design gives more surface grip so it remains in place for general stretching exercises.

The primary role of a fitness mat is to enhance comfort and performance during floor based exercises - the adidas Elite Training Mat does just that. 8mm thick, the mat makes for a comfortable workout, effectively cushioning your feet, hands and knees on contact.

The roll up design of the mat means that you can store it in the smallest space and easily fit it in your gym bag.

The iconic three stripes can be used as a guide for developing good posture and positioning on the mat throughout all moves and stretches. 173cm in length, the training mat is long enough for full body stretching and thick enough for ground based strength and power moves.
node.bulletpoints: Easy to clean material, Flat size: 173 x 61 x 0.8cm, Grey Elite Training Mat featuring iconic adidas 3 stripes, Roll up design for easy storage, Comfortable 8mm thick padding, Designed with shoulder carrying strap through eyelet

node.usp1:
The roll up design of the adidas Training Mat means that you can store it in the smallest space and easily fit it in your gym bag or simply hang it over your shoulder using the integrated carry strap.

The padded surface is 10mm thick, effectively cushioning your hands, feet and knees, and features 'closed cell' technology foam to minimise the amount of moisture that can be absorbed by the mat. This means it will stay 'fresh' during not just the first but also many workouts thereafter.
node.bulletpoints: 183 x 61cm, Comfortable 10mm thick padding, Extra padded reversible surface, Packaged with integrated carry strap

node.usp1:
Foam rolling has become an integrated part of athletes conditioning regime as it enables them to stay mobile and recover faster from soft tissue fatigue. The hard inner sleeve of the adidas Foam Roller takes this approach to the next level by enabling you to roll and massage muscle tissue much deeper than is possible with soft rollers.

Hours of testing goes in to every one of our products. The diameter and length of the roller enables you to spend the least amount of time rolling whilst massaging the maximum amount of muscle tissue.

Simply find the muscle that is tense or fatigued then roll over it with your bodyweight on the roller (the only rule is that you roll in the direction of the muscle fibres rather than across them) .
node.bulletpoints: 33cm length x 14cm diameter, Hard inner sleeve enables you to roll and massage deeper than soft rollers, Helps you recover faster from soft tissue fatigue

node.usp1:
Relieve your muscles of minor aches and pains by applying pressure to the area with the adidas Massage Ball.

8.3cm in diameter, the ball can be used anywhere on the body and mimics a deep tissue massage.

To stabilise movement of the massage ball, use it against the floor, wall or hard surface to target the specific muscle ache.
node.bulletpoints: 8.3cm diameter, Assists with massaging minor muscular aches and pains, Can be used anywhere on the body, Mimics a deep tissue massage

node.usp1:
Ridding muscles of lactic acid or lactic 'pooling' and promoting blood flow before or after heavy exercise or training, the adidas Massage Roller is a self-massaging tool designed to easily target specific muscles.

49.5cm in length, the roller helps to speed up recovery time, working to minimise muscular aches and pains, ensuring you can quickly return to your training routine.
node.bulletpoints: 48.7cm length, Helps reduce muscular aches and pains, Improves recovery time, Self-massaging tool designed to easily target specific muscles, Use before and after training or sport to improve circulation

node.usp1:
Your body is only as strong as the weakest link, so small muscles in your forearms, hands and wrists play an essential role in any exercise that involves lifting weights.

Grip exercises can lead to increased forearm muscularity, hand strength, endurance and dexterity, which in turn leads to better weight training performance.

The pair of adidas Professional Grip trainers feature angled springs which allow for graded resistance to be used to train for hand strength and grip endurance. Take them with you anywhere and build up your grip on the go.
node.bulletpoints: Angled springs, Easy grip handles, Ideal tool for improved grip endurance and strength

node.usp1:
A gymball has to offer a fine balance between support and instability, if the ball is too rigid or too soft then the effects on your core stabilising muscles will be compromised. The adidas Gymballs all perform to these optimal levels.

This particular Gymball has been manufactured with anti-burst material for added safety and features a dual texture grip for extra stability. 55cm in diameter, the gymball is ideal for users between 5' 1" and 5' 6" tall - this is important to know when selecting your gymball as your knees should be positioned just a little lower than your pelvis to make a 90 degree angle.

Enhancing the effects of your daily workout, the gymball is used to keep the balance, with the body working different muscle groups that wouldn't be active while exercising on a flat surface. Suitable for sit-ups, back exercises, stretching and resistance work, the adidas Gymball is a must-have fitness accessory in your collection and comes with the necessary hand pump.

The 55cm Gymball features alongside 65cm and 75cm versions (sold separately) in the adidas Training Hardware Indoor range.
node.bulletpoints: 55cm diameter - ideal for users between 155 - 167cm (5' 1" - 5' 6") tall, Anti-burst material, Grey Gymball with dual texture grip for extra stability, Includes hand pump

A gymball has to offer a fine balance between support and instability, if the ball is too rigid or too soft then the effects on your core stabilising muscles will be compromised. It's one of the most versatile pieces of equipment designed to be inexpensive and productive towards your fitness goals.

The adidas Premium Gymball can be used to enhance your overall performance, effective for developing balance and core strength by utilising various muscles to keep you stabilised throughout your exercises. Having a weighted base incorporated into its design means it offers additional grip and won't roll away during your workout.

Suitable for users between 5' 7" and 6' 1" tall, the 65cm Premium Gymball has been manufactured with anti-burst material for added safety.

Included with the adidas Premium Gymball is a hand pump and workout chart which demonstrates the wide array of exercises that can be performed with this simple fitness accessory.
node.bulletpoints: 65cm diameter - ideal for users between 170 - 185cm (5' 7" - 6' 1") tall., Anti-burst material, Grey adidas Premium Gymball with weighted base to prevent rolling, Workout chart and hand pump included

node.usp1:
It may sound obvious that a Dual Grip Ball allows you to train one handed rather than needing to hold the ball constantly with two hands, opening up endless possibilities for training the body through all three of its planes of motion - sagittal, frontal and transverse.

The 3kg weighted rubber ball has deep handles moulded in to its sides with its mass balanced in the centre to enable you to use it both single and double handed. There are numerous exercises that can be performed using the ball. As one example, hold the ball in one hand, stand with your feet apart and swing the ball from hip height across your body to shoulder height then quickly drive it back down to the start position, keep going and if you so wish - add intensity, a squat and a jump at the bottom and top of the movement.

The adidas 100% heavy duty rubber medicine ball is designed to move at speed and that means you will be generating inertia - the taller you are the more you will create when you swing the ball, making the actual weight of the ball feel like it is 3-4 times heavier than it really is.

Available in varying weights, the medicine ball also features a flat edge for floor-based exercises, ensuring the ball doesn't roll away from you during your workout. Plus, its textured surface provides added comfort for a full-on med ball routine.
node.bulletpoints: 100% heavy duty rubber construction, Dual grip handles for added flexibility on exercises, Flat edge for floor exercises, Textured surface for added comfort, Weight: 3kg

node.usp1:
The adidas Slam Ball takes your fitness to a whole new level. This weighted slam ball is an ideal way to build explosive strength, improve muscular endurance, increase speed and response time as well as strengthen and tone a wide variety of muscles. Exercising with a slam ball also burns calories and boosts cardio stamina.

Different from medicine balls, sand-filled adidas slam balls are specially designed to be thrown against to floor without bouncing - this is key to building explosive strength. Perfect for total body and core specific conditioning, this 3kg ball is completely robust to take the full impact of the slam.

Available in a range of weights, adidas Slam Balls introduce variety to your workout and challenge even the most serious athlete. Squat, lunge, sit-up or overhead press your way to increased fitness simply by holding onto the slam ball.
node.bulletpoints: 23cm diameter, Ideal for core strength and power training., Sand-filled no bounce design for slamming on solid surfaces, Weight: 3kg, Wipe clean surface

node.usp1:
How do you improve your push-up? Push-ups are a great exercise to build upper body and core strength. Simple yet effective, they can be incorporated into any workout, anywhere.

The adidas Swivel Push Up Bars enhance and add variety in performing this staple body weight exercise, transforming the ordinary push-up into an extraordinary push-up.

By adding a unique swivel action, the swivel push-up bars enable you to lock out your wrist and rotate as you lower to the push-up position. This calls upon more chest, shoulder and back muscle than a regular push up meaning bigger, better results in less time. As it's a natural movement, it actively reduces strain on the elbow and wrist joints and the smooth bearing discs help make it one smooth rotation. Alternatively the bars can be locked in position for traditional static push-ups.

Sold as a pair.
node.bulletpoints: Lightweight non-slip design, Rotating push-up handles which can also be locked into position, Smooth ball-bearing disc, Supportive and comfortable

node.usp1:
Resistance training but without weights!

Two (65cm) industrial strength resistance tubes are attached to a 70cm steel bar so that you can curl, press, squat, rotate and work every muscle in your body.

The adjustable strap enables you to adapt the resistance in an instant and with the four carabiners, you can attach both tubes to one end of the bar to double up the resistance for rip, cross chop and racquet style exercises.

This is a key piece of conditioning equipment because most resistance equipment limits your exercise options by loading the body only vertically. With the TrainBar you 'load' the muscles that rotate the torso which basically means you will develop '3 dimensional' strength rather than only working through a single plane of motion.

If you position your hands close together on the bar you'll notice the challenge to the shoulder muscles increases when you do any exercises that involve rotation.

The TrainBar enables you to work all three planes of motion against a challenging level of resistance so you can develop a strong core and perform functional strength exercises in no time.

This adidas product is suitable for outdoor fitness so you can attach it to street furniture or any solid item at the park or in your garden. With both tubes attached to one end of the bar there is a challenging amount of elastic tension which is ideal for working developing strength, torsion and recoil (essential for all racquet sports, throwing and kicking sports).
node.bulletpoints: 2 x 65cm high resistance tubes and 1 x 70cm steel bar, Adjustable strap enables you to adapt the resistance level instantly, Curl, press, squat and rotate to work virtually every muscle in your body

node.usp1:
The 'roll out' is considered by experts to be one of the most productive (and challenging) abdominal exercises in the gym.

Originally performed by 'rolling out' on a gymball, the adidas Ab Wheel improves and optimises the movement by placing you closer to the floor - this means that every muscle involved in stability and dynamic strength is called in to action.

The first time you roll out, do it on your knees and keep the wheel under your body. As you improve, you can lift your knees off the ground and push the roller further in front of you - at this point your entire bodyweight is held through your abdominals making this one of the most targeted ways of working those particular muscles.

Doing 1000s of sit ups won't give you flat abs - to achieve that you have to work the abdominal muscles as an integrated part of your torso. Roll outs are challenging but highly productive.

Adidas Ab wheel is built to deliver results no matter if you are training for MMA, team sports or integrating it in to your WOD (workout of the day).
node.bulletpoints: 18cm diameter wheel with two soft grip handles, Designed to improve and optimise movement, Engages core muscles for stability and dynamic strength

node.usp1:
Developing core strength is imperative if you want to become stronger in all other aspects of your training, especially weight training.

Designed to engage the core muscles and strengthen the upper body, the robust and sturdy set of two adidas Core Rollers feature ergonomic hand grips to ensure you can perform your exercises with confidence.

The rolling motion of the equipment triggers hard to target muscles through a variety of exercises such as oblique and pike roll-outs. Having a roller to each hand adds a further level of intensity than using the traditional singular adidas ab wheel.
node.bulletpoints: Designed to engage core muscles and strengthen the upper body., Individual rollers can be used to train the core, arms, chest, shoulders and hips., Robust, sturdy design with ergonomic hand grips, Rolling motion triggers hard to target muscles throughout a variety of exercises.

node.usp1:
Push-ups are a great exercise to build upper body and core strength, typically performed on the floor. Simple yet effective, they can be incorporated into any workout, anywhere.

Using push-up bars can offer further training benefits beyond the no-equipment push-up. The adidas Push Up Bars are particularly beneficial if you suffer from wrist discomfort when performing your usual push-ups. The apparatus enables you to exercise free of pain and lets you lower yourself closer to the floor which increases the muscle work output required.

The handles are two separate pieces of equipment, two platforms to grip with each hand, allowing you to change the position and direction of your wrists.
node.bulletpoints: Ideal for building upper body and core strength, Lightweight, non-slip design, Sturdy platforms to perform push-ups, Supportive and comfortable, easing wrist discomfort

node.usp1:
Be on your best game and quicken your reaction time.

The adidas Reaction Ball creates a dynamic, unpredictable bounce to help improve hand-eye coordination and reaction speed.

When bounced off the floor or wall, or volleyed between two team mates, the adidas Reaction Ball rebounds with no two bounces ever being the same. Plus, chasing the ball develops speed and agility in addition to dynamic core strength.
node.bulletpoints: Ideal for speed training and hand-eye coordination, Large adidas Reaction Ball 10cm in diameter, Pool blue colour with adidas logo

node.usp1:
Improve your explosive jump training, leg strength and dynamic balance with the heavy-duty adidas Plyometric Platform.

Improved reaction of 'fast-twitch' muscle fibres is a major benefit of using a plyometric platform. These muscle fibres throughout the body need to contract quickly to generate maximum force for each jump. The higher you jump, the more muscle tissue is activated. Though the landing phase is just as important as the jump itself.

Measuring 79 x 64 x 55cm, the adidas plyo box has a soft surface which helps to reduce stress on leg joints when landing, so it can be easily incorporated into your complete training regime without the worry of possible injury.

Box jump your way to a fitter self or perform step ups, lateral step overs, elevated push ups and much more.
node.bulletpoints: Dimensions: 79 x 64 x 55cm, Easy clean, wipe down surface, Soft surface for a safe jump landing, Stylish and simple design with adidas logo

node.usp1:
Target any muscle group effectively and simply with the Reebok Power Band.

Made from a highly durable rubber which maintains its strength and flexibility after prolonged periods of use, the Reebok Power Bands come in three different colours, red, grey and black which signify the strength levels of light, medium and heavy (sold separately). This range of resistance provides the ideal platform for progressive training.

The resistances are per band and equate to the approximate loading at slight extension and up to maximum extension (or maximum loading) 12.5KG - 39KG
node.bulletpoints: Can be used for an individual workout or as added resistance, Colour coded strength levels: Level 1 Red - Light, Level 2 Grey - Medium and Level 3 Black - Heavy, Highly durable rubber, Red Reebok Power Band - Level 1 Light, Tensile Strength pull of 200% 27.5lbs, Tensile Strength pull of 300% 37.5lbs

node.usp1:

This range of resistance provides the ideal platform for progressive training.

The resistances are per band and equate to the approximate loading at slight extension and up to maximum extension (or maximum loading) 17.5KG - 59KG
node.bulletpoints: Can be used for an individual workout or as added resistance, Colour coded strength levels: Level 1 Red - Light, Level 2 Grey - Medium and Level 3 Black - Heavy, Excellent for assisted dips or pull ups, Grey Reebok Power Band - Level 2 Medium, Highly durable rubber, Tensile Strength pull of 200% 38.5lbs, Tensile Strength pull of 300% 52.5lbs

node.usp1:
The adidas Mini Bands enable you to add resistance to your workout without the need for additional weights. With 3 included in the pack of varying resistance levels and thickness (light, medium and heavy), the bands are ideal for toning, stretching or rehabilitation exercises.

The possibilities are endless with resistance bands. Challenge your muscles and target the areas you want.
node.bulletpoints: 3 resistance levels included - light/medium/heavy, 60cm (loop circumference) x 5cm (width) x 0.4/0.8/1.2mm (thickness), Add resistance to your workout without the need for additional weights, adidas Mini Bands can be used on their own for toning, stretching or rehabilitation exercises

node.usp1:
adidas Stretch Assist Band is a great tool for improving and assisting with your stretches, replacing static stretching equipment and can be easily used anytime, anywhere.

Supporting classic static stretches and more dynamic stretches, the assist band helps to improve flexibility and range of motion during recovery periods.
node.bulletpoints: 6 loops provide varying degrees of stretch, Assists you with holding stretches during warm-up and cool down, Develops flexibility and range of motion during rehabilitation, Helps train muscle fibres to relax into the stretch

node.usp1:
adidas Power Tubes have a fabric outer sleeve for added safety when working out. The available resistances of levels 1, 2 and 3 (sold separately) make this a versatile training product as you can choose the appropriate resistance to suit the muscles being targeted. The outer sleeve means resistance remains constant even when the band makes contact with you.

For many years, resistance (strength) training was considered to be all about weights, but the advent of core and functional training led to a requirement for new ways of targeting specific muscles. The Power Tubes enable you to perform quick, effective toning and strength exercises every day with minimum delayed muscle fatigue. Now even the fittest athlete can benefit from the dynamic and versatile moves that can be performed using the adidas Power Tubes.
node.bulletpoints: Compact design, Soft outer sleeve for added protection, Variable resistance levels 1, 2, 3 (sold separately), Versatile and portable piece of equipment to perform a large number of strength exercises

node.usp1:
Training resistance bands have been a key product for therapists and coaches for many years, allowing them to apply resistance to exactly the right muscles they want to target. The bands can be used long or short to adapt the resistance and because they flex you can perform tri-planer movements.

The adidas Training Bands aren't intended to create very 'heavy' resistance. Their design allows you to wrap them across muscles so that you can challenge those muscles directly rather than having your arms and legs working as part of the movement.

Performing classic exercises like push ups and crunches with the training band, you will get a more targeted toning and strength experience. Just a few exercise ideas are printed on the bands but the possibilities really are endless, especially when you begin to attach the bands to the opposite sides of your body as this produces muscle activity called 'contralateral' as well as 'ipso'lateral'- both of which are fantastic exercises for conditioning.
node.bulletpoints: 1.8m long, Pack of two - high and medium resistance (blue/red), Workout instruction on each band, 100% latex

node.usp1:
Training resistance bands have been a key product for therapists and coaches for many years, allowing them to apply resistance to exactly the right muscle they want to target. The band can be used long or short to adapt the resistance and because it flexes you can perform tri-planer movements.

The adidas Training Band isn't intended to create very 'heavy' resistance. Its design uniquely allows you to wrap it across muscles so that you can challenge those muscles directly rather than by always having to have arms and legs (levers) as part of the movement.

Performing classic exercises like push ups and crunches with the training band, you will get a more targeted toning and strength experience. Just a few exercise ideas are printed on the band but the possibilities really are endless, especially when you begin to attach the bans to the opposite sides of your body as this produces muscle activity called contralateral as well as ipso lateral - both fantastic exercises for conditioning.

Also available in a pack of two adidas Training Bands.
node.bulletpoints: 1.8m long, Single Training Band (medium resistance), Workout instructions on the band

node.usp1:
Simple but effective, Power Bands provide a versatile total body workout, targeting virtually every major muscle group and are excellent if you're travelling as they're so portable and lightweight.

Adaptable to various fitness levels and abilities, the adidas Power Bands can be used for well-known and loved strength and conditioning exercises and can be used with other equipment such as weights, enabling you to receive the benefits from two types of exercises at once.

Also available in light and heavy variants (sold separately).

The resistances are per band and equate to the approximate loading at slight extension and up to maximum extension (or maximum loading) 17.5KG - 59KG
node.bulletpoints: 1m length, 4cm width, Ideal for assisted pull-ups or dips, Medium resistance band - Black, Tensile Strength pull of 200% 38.5lbs, Tensile Strength pull of 300% 52.5lbs, Versatile and lightweight for a multitude of strength and conditioning exercises

node.usp1:

Also available in light and medium variants (sold separately).

The resistances are per band and equate to the approximate loading at slight extension and up to maximum extension (or maximum loading) 25KG - 80KG
node.bulletpoints: 1m length, 6.4cm width, Heavy resistance band - Red, Ideal for assisted pull-ups or dips, Tensile Strength pull of 200% 55lbs, Tensile Strength pull of 300% 75lbs, Versatile and lightweight for a multitude of strength and conditioning exercises

node.usp1:
The adidas Sand Bag enables you to add rotation and resistance to your workouts and perform both single and two handed moves. The bag encourages core muscle activation when held by any of its five grab handles, enabling you to push, pull and even throw the bag to engage multiple muscle groups in every repetition.

Doubling up as a kettlebell, barbell or dumbbell for fast dynamic moves, the adidas Sand Bag has been packed with a double skin liner to ensure it doesn't become unstable or 'sloppy'.
node.bulletpoints: 5 grab handles, Can double as a kettlebell, dumbbell or barbell, Encourages core muscle activation, Push, pull or throw to engage multiple muscle groups

node.usp1:
Skipping is universally recognised as a route to fun and fitness. Delivered to you in a compact carrying case, the unique adidas skipping rope can be adjusted in terms of weight to target the arms and exert more force through the torso, core and cardio endurance.

275cm in length the adidas rope includes two 50g and two 100g weighted handle inserts, giving you the freedom and choice to up your intensity. The weighted rope is a high performance fitness product which requires skill and practice, so work on your technique in short bursts. Increasingly incorporated into HIIT training (High Intensity Interval Training), skipping is one of the purest methods for increasing heart rate and delivering great results.
node.bulletpoints: 2 x 50g and 2 x 100g weighted handle inserts, 275cm length, Carrying case included, Interchangeable weight ropes

node.usp1:
Jumping rope is a highly effective way to improve fitness levels, stamina, agility and coordination. The 3m adjustable jump rope from adidas is made with a high velocity 4mm wire cable and integrated stainless steel ball bearings for a smooth transition.

With increased speed, you'll soon feel the burn in the arms and shoulders, toning whilst improving cardio endurance. As your arms wear out first before the legs, you start to fatigue and miss the jump - that's why the adidas Jump Rope is made with lightweight, ergonomic handles to ensure you can jump with precision, keeping your arms active but not overworked.
node.bulletpoints: 3m adjustable length, High velocity 4mm wire cable, Lightweight, ergonomic handles, Stainless steel ball bearings for a smooth transition

node.usp1:
Perfect for single, double and triple unders, the adidas Skipping Rope is coated in steel cable for picking up maximum speed. This durable material ensures the rope is long lasting too, ensuring any obvious sign of wear and tear is kept to an absolute minimum through prolonged use.

It's also customisable in length. This rope, 3m in length, can be adjusted and trimmed to the individual owner's height. Often used in competition, cable skipping ropes cater for the serious athletes and fitness pros, providing the fundamentals required for a high intensity full body workout.

The handles mustn't go unnoticed. The adidas Cable Skipping Rope features textured handle grips for added comfort throughout skipping.
node.bulletpoints: Coated in steel cable for maximum speed, Fully adjustable 3m rope, Textured handle grip for comfort

node.usp1:
Skipping is an exercise that has been widely used for decades to build endurance, speed and agility.

The advancement and development of new materials means that the old fashioned leather rope is no longer the only option. This 3m long adidas Essential Skipping Rope is easily adjustable and features slim grip handles for a streamlined, full body skipping workout.

Simple, but effective, the essential skipping rope is designed to raise your heart rate, challenge you and keep you strong and agile.
node.bulletpoints: 3m in length, Adjustable adidas Essential Skipping Rope, Fast smooth action, Slim grip handles

node.usp1:
Bringing back old school design with full size 'fat' comfort foam handles, the adidas Speed Rope is perfect to use whilst you are wearing boxing hand wraps.

Being adjustable in length, you can customise the rope to suit your style - short for fast and furious and long for slower but stronger strokes.

Plus, the integrated ball bearing inside the rope translates your force into speed, giving you both speed and strength in a single session.

A simple, but effective cardio workout, the essential skipping rope is designed to raise your heart rate, challenge you and keep you strong and agile.
node.bulletpoints: 3m in length, Adjustable rope, Comfort foam handle, Integral bearing for speed training

node.usp1:
Super strong and highly visible, these adidas cones add purpose and direction to every speed and agility training session, whilst defining space with their substantial presence.

Run point to point, set the cones in a zig zag formation or simply define a space as the field of play. Using these cones will bring order and structure to your training sessions - straight lines only happen on the track, on the pitch it's all about the ability to react and change direction faster than the opposition.

The wide base creates stability whilst the height creates focus and the colour enhances visibility - all you have to do is add the energy.
node.bulletpoints: High visibility, durable material, Large cones with added grooves for use with adidas agility poles, Wide base for extra stability

node.usp1:
The adidas Speed Hurdle is a memory foam wedge encased in a waterproof outer skin with the base carefully weighted to provide stability if knocked, but at the same time forgiving if the athlete crashes in to it at speed.

Standing 31cm high the hurdle sits below the knee of most athletes making it an achievable height to clear at speed whilst still being an obstacle that needs action to avoid.
node.bulletpoints: 31cm height, 60cm width, Ideal for improving footwork and agility, Memory foam padding, Water resistant outer layer, Weighted base for stability

node.usp1:
Being adjustable between 15 and 30cm ensures that these hurdles are suitable for both speed and accuracy training. The high impact plastic construction gives a strong but flexible target to work over during fast feet speed drills.

Speed is skill and skill is only achieved with quality practice. Using these hurdles to define the space and height you want your athletes to achieve brings focus to every movement that they perform and frankly it means if they get it wrong we all know about it as the hurdle will flag up the fact they hit it.
node.bulletpoints: 2 adjustable heights: 15cm and 30cm, 44.8cm width, High impact plastic material, One piece construction

node.usp1:
Every athlete reaches a point when they simply can't find any more power in their legs - unless they gain a competitive advantage by training with this running chute from adidas.

With the parachute attached to a belt that is worn around the waist, the wearer then sprints and the chute quickly releases when you reach sufficient speed, resisting against the air to create drag. This in turn increases your power, speed, agility, reactions and quickness.

Use over distances ranging between 15 -100m (metre) sprints, whilst it may take you a few attempts to get the parachute 'inflated' when you run the best way of actually mastering the 'technique' is to simply throw it behind you and forget it is there.
node.bulletpoints: 120cm diameter parachute, Adjustable belt with quick release buckle, Carry bag included, Improves power and endurance, Specially designed to increase drag resistance

node.usp1:
The adidas lateral speed resistor features two quick fit ankle straps joined together by an ultra-resistance tube with a nylon outer sleeve. By wearing one strap on each ankle you create not just resistance but also a connection between the actions of your core and the extremities of your limbs which in turn develops more explosive and useable lower body power.

As with anything new, start with the basics so keep one foot fixed on the floor whilst the other moves, then as you improve; walk, lunge and stride around lifting alternating feet until eventually and ultimately you are able run and jump whilst powering up the speed resistor.
node.bulletpoints: 55cm padded resistance rope, Adjustable padded ankle cuffs, Develops lower body muscles, Improves lateral speed

node.usp1:
The 3 metre long nylon Speed Ladder from adidas features six high impact plastic rungs. Each cell of the ladder is super-sized for fast feet exercises wearing training shoes or soccer boots.

The ladder comes to life when you stop thinking of it as a straight line and look at it as a series of targets and challenges you can jump from box to box or zig zag side to side, the priority is to work on speed, quality of movement and power as equals.

The rungs are a highly visible infrared orange, so when you are moving with fast feet you see your target with your peripheral vision rather than needing to look down all the time (making this better for functional training). Plus, the sides of each cell are soft rather than rigid to minimise any 'trip' risk.
node.bulletpoints: 3m length, 6 Solid bars with fabric connectors, Carry case included, Develops foot speed and cardio performance, Suction cups and pegs for indoor or outdoor use

node.usp1:
This set of 6 hurdles from adidas is suitable for both speed and accuracy training. The high impact plastic construction gives a strong but flexible target to work over during fast feet speed drills.

Set the hurdles equal distance apart to encourage disciplined stride length and height.

Also available in a set of 6 large hurdles.
node.bulletpoints: 15cm height, Flexible, lightweight and impact resistant material, One piece construction, Set of 6 small agility hurdles

node.usp1:

node.bulletpoints: 30.5cm height, Flexible, lightweight and impact resistant material, One piece construction, Set of 6 large agility hurdles

node.usp1:
High visibility, crush resistant low profile discs that enable you to create multiple layouts on the training field or gym. Included in each pack are 30 discs (15 'infrared' and 15 'pool' blue colours). Also included is the stacking system to keep the discs safe and tidy when not in use.

Set the discs out in lanes, squares, zig zags or even as targets on the ground. Train for speed agility and accuracy in both hand eye co-ordination, as well as stride length and foot speed.

The low profile design means that even when tired and fatigued, working over and around the discs is safe.

A high gloss finish means that rain, mud and sweat will easily wash off the discs whilst the high visibility colour ensures that you can set the field of play as big as you like whilst never losing sight of the game line.
node.bulletpoints: 20cm height, 18.7cm diameter, Develops agile speed, skill and agility, Includes storage system, Low profile, high visibility, Pack of 30: 15 infrared, 15 pool blue

node.usp1:
The adidas Agility Grid features six hexagonal cells that can be used individually to create multiple patterns for fast feet, power and agility training drills. The impact resistant material will flex under impact from foot strikes while the high visibility low profile finish encourages confidence from participants.

Set the cells apart and bound from section to section to develop power and accuracy in your stride and foot positioning. Place the cells close together and you have a fast feet session set up and ready for action in seconds. Speed, agility and quickness can all be improved and developed with practice, using the right equipment adds focus, commitment and structure to that process.

The high vis works well on all surfaces and the impact resistance materials ensure you can perform in all environments as they are rain, mud, sun and cold resistant.
node.bulletpoints: adidas Agility Grid includes 6 grid cells, Develops agile reflexes, High visibility, Includes fabric connector for storage, Low profile, impact resistant material

node.usp1:
You set the rules

Super strong and highly visible, these orange cones from adidas add purpose and direction to speed and agility training session. With six per pack you can create numerous configurations for running and bounding drills.

Straight lines only happen on the track, on the pitch it's all about the ability to react and change direction faster than the opposition. Run point to point, set the cones in a zig zag formation or simply define a space as the field of play, using these cones will bring order and structure to your training sessions.
node.bulletpoints: 23cm height, adidas Training Cones - pack of 6, Improves skill and agility, Infrared for high visibility, Stackable design

node.usp1:
Part of the adidas Yoga range but ideal for general fitness activity, the stylish sports hairbands are elasticated and come in a set of 6 which means you'll always have a headband when you need one and can choose the colour to best match your apparel.

The high quality adidas hairband with a silicone strip on the inside fits comfortably and remains securely in place, preventing hair from impeding your vision during yoga, running, tennis - or any type of fitness activity for that matter.

Hand washable, the hairbands keep their elasticity after time and are a fashionable yet practical addition to your workout wardrobe.
node.bulletpoints: Ideal for Yoga, sports and general fitness, One size fits all, Pack of 6 elasticated sports hair bands, in a range of colours, Prevents hair from impeding vision

node.usp1:
The adidas Hair Band in a stylish 'Tech Beige' shade is the ideal hair band for Yogis and fitness enthusiasts who need to keep their hair pulled back during all types of physical activity.

The hairband is non-slip, fitting comfortably and securely in place at all times, so you won't need to keep readjusting during your practice or training. Plus it effectively absorbs sweat and wicks moisture to keep you cool.

One size fits all, the adidas Hair Band comes in a variety of colours (sold separately) and is made with hand-washable, high quality fabrics.

node.usp1:
Using a counterbalance system to secure itself in position, the adidas Door Gym enables the user to perform an impressive range of highly effective upper and lower body exercises using their body weight as the resistance.

With four hand grip options including close, wide, hammer and inverted, the Door Gym provides an alternative to, or complements, weight training.

The counterbalance system secures the product safely in position on the door frame and you can also use the equipment on the ground to perform push-ups or tricep dips.
node.bulletpoints: Can also be used on the floor for press-ups and tricep dips, Counterbalance system secures the product safely to the majority of doors, Designed to improve grip strength and isometric ability in the shoulders and upper back, Enables the user to perform a range of highly effective upper and lower body exercises using body weight, Four hand grip options: close, wide, hammer and inverted

node.usp1:
Suspended bodyweight training is one of the latest, most radical and innovative types of exercise you can do to improve strength, power, balance and agility.

The adidas 36Zero Suspension Trainer is the perfect piece of fitness equipment to work your entire body without the need for heavy lifting. Utilising a series of different attachments from rings, pads, ab straps and handles, you can perform a multitude of upper and lower body exercises.

Its versatile anchor enables you to attach both horizontally and vertically. The hand grips and foot straps are quickly and easily exchanged for rapid effective muscle conditioning and HITT (High Intensity Interval Training). Plus the incorporated ab straps can be used for intense targeted abdominal exercises.

The 36Zero training plan has four phases. To make the plan safe, effective, and fun, each phase should be completed in the intended order.
node.usp2:
Phase 1

Phase one introduces fundamental movements to help you build a strong, stable torsothe foundation of all movement to improve your ability to move and perform efficiently. This will be particularly helpful in later phases when workouts become more challenging.

Phase 2

Everyone has a dominant side of their body. Movement progressions in this phase challenge the right and left sides of your body independently. This helps each side move more efficiently on its own and improves how your entire body moves by decreasing muscle imbalances.

Phase 3

The third part of this plan challenges the solid foundation built in the previous phases with diverse movements that train your body from every angle. This phase helps solidify your bodys stability and strength

Phase 4

In the final phase, workouts will challenge you to move more quickly from one exercise to the next and push yourself to maintain proper form the entire time. This phase will help you increase your muscular and cardiovascular endurance
node.bulletpoints: Included ab straps ideal for intense targeted abdominal exercises, Included hand grips and foot straps are quickly and easily exchanged, Quick release handle interchange, Suspension bodyweight training apparatus, Versatile anchor enables you to attach both horizontally and vertically

node.usp1: The 350ml capacity stylish adidas Hand Held Water Bottle is the easiest way to keep hydrated on your run with an integrated hand grip and grooves for comfort, and a sports pull-up cap for convenience whilst moving.
node.bulletpoints: 350ml capacity, Finger grooves for added comfort, Integrated hand grip, ideal for running, Pull-up cap for convenience whilst moving

node.usp1:
If you're into Yoga or 'Broga' (Yoga for the male athlete), you'll know that for even a few minutes every day, the practice can help you recognise, address and develop what you need, whether that's to feel better generally, gain strength, reduce stress or avoid injury. You'll also realise that Yoga is what you make it. There are no rules or regulations.

To help you achieve those wellbeing goals; you'll need the right equipment.

Yoga mats come in a variety of colours, patterns, sizes, shapes and thickness, so your choice depends on the type of Yoga you practice (and how much you're likely to perspire in that practice), as well as the amount of cushioning you need.

Simple and elegant, the adidas non-slip Yoga mat has a textured surface for greater pose alignment and traction; this surface is comfortable and soft, making it ideal for regular Yoga practice. Thickness of the Yoga mat is important too. 4mm thick, the adidas Yoga Mat provides enough cushioning for your joints, but is close enough to the floor for you to feel grounded, steady and balanced.

173cm long and 61cm wide, the adidas Yoga Mat offers more than enough space for taller Yogis, ensuring hands and feet remain on the mat throughout poses and stretches, rather than awkwardly resting on the floor.

When you've practised, unplugged and cleansed your mind of the day's stresses and worries, the mat can be easily wiped down and rolled away neatly for convenient storage. A Yoga mat defines your space, it is uncomplicated and it can inspire passion - choose the mat which accurately reflects you as a Yoga practitioner.

With different colours available in the range, you can personalise your mat to suit your Yoga apparel and accessories. The good news is this mat is available in 3 additional stylish colourways.
node.bulletpoints: 173 x 61 x 0.4cm, Black non-slip Yoga mat with textured surface for superior pose alignment, Easy to wipe clean and roll up for storage, Soft, comfortable cushioning ideal for regular Yoga practice

node.usp1:
A Yoga Mat Strap is a great alternative to a Yoga bag for carrying your mat hands-free.

With a simple loop design, this fully adjustable harness strap allows you to carry your Yoga mat easily and comfortably over your shoulder. The robust harness fits any size mat and keeps it securely in place on the move. Easy to use and remove, simply loosen the strap, unroll your mat and off you go.
node.bulletpoints: Easy to attach and remove, Lightweight harness fits any size mat, Sling-style hands free carry strap

node.usp1:
If your Yoga apparel and accessory ensemble is looking a little outdated or dull, it might be time to spruce it up.

The adidas Yoga Mat Bag combines fashion with functionality, featuring a drawstring closure to keep everything secure and an adjustable carry strap to swing over your shoulder take with you on the move. The Yoga bag's handy zip pocket compartment is a space for your smaller essential items.

The sleek Yoga bag is compact and snug whilst providing all the room you need to be able to roll up and slide in your Yoga mat effortlessly.

Wherever your Yoga journey takes you, the adidas Yoga Mat Bag follows.
node.bulletpoints: 100% nylon, Adjustable carry strap, Grey Yoga Mat Bag with drawstring closure

node.usp1:
During detoxing Hot Yoga classes (or Bikram Yoga) especially, where the room is heated to 40°c+, the practitioner can, as expected, become considerably perspired. This means the Yoga mat acts as a means of absorption so it's important you're equipped with the appropriate Yoga mat made for this type of humid environment.

The non-slip, 2mm thick Hot Yoga Mat from adidas is soft and absorbent, designed to wick away moisture as you sweat, ensuring you don't slip during your posture transitions. Whatever your preference on thickness and cushioning, the mat can be used with or without an additional Yoga mat, and can be used on either side; the textured 'grip' side or towel fabric side.

Easy to wash clean after a hot yoga session, the Hot Yoga Mat can be easily rolled up and taken with you anywhere without adding any unnecessary weight to your luggage.

It's only natural that Yoga aficionados are mindful of their impact on the environment. The adidas Hot Yoga mat is eco-friendly with 43% made up of Polymer Environmental Resin (PER) which is a biodegradable synthetic material.
node.bulletpoints: 173 x 61 x 0.2cm, 47% Polyester, 43% Polymer Environmental Resin, 10% Nylon, Easy to wash clean and roll up for storage, Non-slip, textured surface designed to absorb moisture for greater traction, Soft, comfortable cushioning ideal for use with or without an existing Yoga mat

node.usp1:
If you're into Yoga or 'Broga' (Yoga for the male athlete), you'll know that for even a few minutes every day, the practice can help you recognise, address and develop what you need, whether that's to feel better generally, gain strength, reduce stress or avoid injury. You'll also realise that Yoga is what you make it. There are no rules or regulation.

To help you achieve those wellbeing goals and master your pose; you'll need the right equipment.

Yoga blocks are used to support the body, allowing for greater relaxation and preventing over stretching in the early stages of practice. They come in a variety of shapes and materials and are an ideal prop for beginners to build up strength and balance for the more advanced and challenging poses.

Yoga blocks are good for seasoned Yogis too who want to develop their poses even further and practise Yoga as restorative form of exercise following injury.

The cork construction of the adidas Yoga Block makes it firm and durable so practitioners can feel confident with the solid support provided as well as being able to hold their pose for longer. Whether you're practising at home or in a Yoga class on polished wood floors, cork blocks offer superior traction, so you can feel assured that the block will remain in place as you make the transition to your next pose.

22.8 x 12 x 7.5cm, the adidas Yoga Block is a sturdy platform to rest on, especially for the likes of Half Moon and Revolved Triangle poses.

It's only natural that Yoga aficionados are mindful of their impact on the environment. The cork Yoga block is eco-friendly and naturally antibacterial, with no harsh chemicals used in its making.
node.bulletpoints: 22.8 x 12 x 7.5cm, Eco-friendly cork construction, Embossed adidas logo, Firm Yoga block to aid balance in a variety of poses

You'll also realise that Yoga is what you make it. There are no rules or regulation.

To help you achieve those wellbeing goals and master your pose; you'll need the right equipment.

Yoga blocks are used to support the body, allowing for greater relaxation and preventing over stretching in the early stages of practice. They come in a variety of shapes and materials and are an ideal prop for beginners to build up strength and balance for the more advanced and challenging poses.

Yoga blocks are good for seasoned Yogis too who want to develop their poses even further and practise Yoga as restorative form of exercise following injury.

Foam Yoga blocks are particularly popular due to their lightweight nature. The adidas grey foam Yoga Block is constructed with a high quality, dense foam, maintaining the lightweight feel whilst feeling supportive when beneath your hands. 22.8 x 15.2 x 7.6cm, the Yoga Block is one of the larger blocks available, making it an ideal choice to extend your reach and challenge yourself beyond your comfort zone.

A Yoga Block accessory is a must-have for any Yoga aficionado, aiding balance in a wide variety of poses.
node.bulletpoints: 22.8 x 15.2 x 7.6cm, High quality, dense foam construction, Lightweight, firm Yoga block to aid balance in a variety of poses

node.usp1:
A Yoga Strap is a fantastic prop to assist you in holding your poses for longer, increasing your flexibility and ensuring proper alignment. With a strap your reach can go further than you thought possible, so use it to challenge yourself and to try the more advanced poses you've been leading up to.

The 250cm long adidas Yoga Strap features a robust 'D-ring' buckle which holds it in place, providing enough tautness whilst ensuring your movement is not restricted in any way to help you progress in your practice.

The strap's soft yet tough texture means it won't chafe on your skin and its durability means it'll keep its shape through consistent use.
node.bulletpoints: 250cm x 3.8cm, Assists with performing different poses and ensuring proper alignment, Helps to increase flexibility, Robust buckle holds strap in place

node.usp1:
A Pilates Band, or resistance band, is a simple tool with great benefits.

Typically used for Pilates, resistance bands are used for total-body conditioning, enabling you to target numerous muscles. If you're looking to take a break from your heavy lifting regime, a resistance band can be the perfect accessory to keep you active through that recovery phase. Alternatively, adidas Pilates Bands are recommended by physiotherapists to speed up the recovery process, helping you to gain back strength and mobility following injury.

Lightweight and compact, the adidas Pilates Bands can be taken anywhere for a safe and effective workout. Made of professional-grade high quality latex rubber, the Pilates Bands are strong enough to hold up during heavy routines, so you won't have to worry about the bands tearing or weakening over time.

Two resistance levels of light and medium are included, so you can select the level required for your exercises. It's important you choose the right length of resistance band for your height too. 180cm long (or 5' 11"), the adidas Pilates Band is long enough to perform most Pilates moves, but if you're looking for further resistance for specific moves, simply double up the band to the required length.

Incorporating a Pilates resistance band makes your practice much more challenging. It engages more muscle fibres and helps to improve form, leading to a leaner, sculpted body.
node.bulletpoints: 100% latex rubber, 180 x 15cm, Adds resistance and support to your Pilates workout, toning and strengthening key muscles, Can be used for Pilates, strength training workouts and muscle rehabilitation, Light (level 1) and medium (level 2) resistance levels included

node.usp1:
Non-slip Yoga socks are perfect for practitioners who love their practice but are worried about hygiene and getting cold feet during Yoga class. These socks even enable you to go mat-free.

The grey, soft adidas Yoga Socks offer maximum comfort and a barefoot feeling with slip-free security. Breathable and sweat-wicking, the highly functional Yoga Socks feature dotted grip tread and a stretchable attachment at the arch of the foot to keep the sock in place.

An essential for any Pilates or Yoga fan looking to accessorise their practice, the Yoga Socks are available in two sizes (sold separately) - small/medium and medium/large.
node.bulletpoints: 80% Cotton, 17% Polyester, 2% Elastane, 1% Rubber, Small/Medium, Soft and comfortable with adidas logo underfoot, Specifically created for Yoga to provide additional traction, Suitable for foot length 24-26cm, Targeted traction

node.usp1: Your body doesn't move in just one direction. You move forward, back, side to side and rotate. These movements happen in different planes of motion - otherwise known as multiplanar. The ground-based Cage Torso Trainer from the Reebok Functional range is a diverse multiplanar training tool great for total body strength and dynamic power workouts, enabling the user to add rotation to traditional power patterns. You can also turn your Torso Trainer into a T Bar row machine to include T Bar rows into your workout. Simply insert the 7ft Reebok Olympic bar (sold separately) into the pivoting sleeve of the Torso Trainer at the units base and youre ready to work.
node.bulletpoints: Ground-based multiplanar training tool for total body strength workouts, Setup dimensions 5.5 (L) x 5.5 (W) x 31 (H), To be used with 50mm diameter 7ft Olympic bar (sold separately), To be used with bumper plates (sold separately), Train the core effectively with lateral and vertical movements

node.usp1:
Skipping is an exercise that has been widely used for decades to build endurance, speed and agility.

The advancement and development of new materials means that the old fashioned leather rope is no longer the only option. This 3m long adidas rope is easily adjustable to suit your height.

It's light and fast enabling you to concentrate on foot speed without the need to first develop upper body strength. You can use this rope for both high and low intensity workouts which means that you can perform sessions as short as six minutes and achieve an improvement to your cardiovascular efficiency. The comfort grip handles ensure you can skip faster for longer.
node.bulletpoints: 3m long skipping rope, Adjustable to suit user height, Easy, comfort grip handles

node.usp1:
A fundamental piece of rehabilitation and recovery equipment, the Reebok Tube Foam Roller part of the Functional Training range, decreases muscle tension and tightness after a tough workout. It can also be used pre-workout to increase blood flow and loosen up your muscles ready for exercise.

Inside the foam roller is a solid plastic core aiding deep tissue massage and outside, high density synthetic foam to massage away nagging pains and knots. 38 x 14 x 14cm , the Reebok Foam Roller is easy to clean and features a non-slip surface plus, its construction means it reliably holds its shape to deliver consistent healing and faster recovery with every use.
node.bulletpoints: 38cm x 14cm x 14cm, Easy to clean, non-slip surface, Reebok Foam Roller with high density synthetic foam outer, Solid plastic core enables deep tissue massage

node.usp1:
The 55cm grey Reebok Gymball is one of the most versatile pieces of exercise equipment for improved all-round fitness - the gymball can be used to perform a wide variety of exercises which will considerably improve your core strength, posture and flexibility.

Though they may appear the same, gymballs come in many diametrical sizes and materials, so it's important to choose the right exercise ball for you.

The 55cm Reebok Gymball has been manufactured with a high-density rubber to ensure longevity, and is suitable for those between 155cm and 167cm (approximately 5'1"-5'6"). Selecting the appropriately sized gymball for your height is extremely important in ensuring you get the most of out of your workout. By observing the '90 degree rule' (where both feet are planted on the floor and knees positioned a little lower than the pelvis, making a 90 degree angle), you'll discover your ideal gymball size.

It's also important to note that your height alone isn't the only factor in determining the right ball size. As Reebok exercise balls are flexible and offer resistance, weight is also an important factor.

Supporting your ab crunches, tricep dips and planks, the grey gymball features anti-burst technology, meaning if the ball happens to puncture during your workout, it will slowly and safely deflate to avoid any possible injuries. Every Reebok Gymball ships with its very own kit including the fundamental pump.

And, if you're in need of a little inspiration to kick-start your gymball workout, this gymball comes complete with its very own workout DVD.
node.bulletpoints: Diameter 55cm, Grey 55cm Reebok Gymball from the Reebok Women's Training range, Ideal for sit ups, core strength, stability and general fitness, Includes workout DVD and gymball pump, Suitable for users between 155cm and 167cm tall

node.usp1:
It's important for every lifter to be able to confidently control their bodyweight before progressing onto weighted movements. Suspension rings are a fantastic way to increase difficulty for advanced lifters and offer a great deal of mobility as well as being an excellent method for performing versatile upper and lower body workouts.

With the increased movement of any exercise, the rings and straps will move and vibrate forcing the user to apply a greater degree of muscle activation. You'll train your core to the maximum due to the rings' instability and free movement.

Use these pair of Reebok Suspension Rings to perform exercises such as dips, push ups, lunges and muscle ups through the use of the heavy-duty nylon adjustable straps which can be easily released using the quick-release buckle.

Suitable for gym use and all functional areas, common exercises can take on a whole new dimension when performed using the rings. With limitless possibilities for training, suspension rings are a positive addition to any functional training regimen.
node.bulletpoints: Includes 2 x heavy duty nylon straps with quick release buckle, Reebok Suspension Rings, adjustable length for upper and lower body exercises, Simple fixing mechanism, Sold as a pair, Suitable for gym and all functional areas

node.usp1:
Strength training is proven to be one of the most effective methods to reduce body fat, increase lean muscle mass and burn calories more efficiently. Dumbbells are amongst the most widely used pieces of equipment and are a vital part of any functional training regime.

The Reebok Dumbbells, part of the Reebok Functional range, are available in weights ranging from 5kg up to 50kg, making them ideal for progressive functional training and increasing body strength. The black knurled steel handle ensures a solid grip whilst the hexagonal shape prevents the weights rolling during lifting sessions.

Strong and robust in design, the dumbbells are heavy-duty with a rubber coating which lessens noise, floor damage, and wear and tear on the dumbbells themselves. The use of a functional lifting platform (sold separately) is advised for heavier lifting sessions.
node.bulletpoints: Black knurled steel handle for a solid grip, Hexagonal shape design prevents rolling, Reebok 5kg Dumbbell, Rubber coated solid steel dumbbells reduce noise and damage, Weights range from 5kg up to 50kg

The black knurled steel handle ensures a solid grip whilst the hexagonal shape prevents the weights rolling during lifting sessions.

Strong and robust in design, the dumbbells are heavy-duty with a rubber coating which lessens noise, floor damage, and wear and tear on the dumbbells themselves. The use of a functional lifting platform (sold separately) is advised for heavier lifting sessions.
node.bulletpoints: Black knurled steel handle for a solid grip, Hexagonal shape design prevents rolling, Reebok 17.5kg Cast Iron Dumbbell, Rubber coated solid steel dumbbells reduce noise and damage, Weights range from 5kg up to 50kg

node.usp1:
An effective means of improving strength gains, full-body conditioning, agility and balance, the Cast Iron Kettlebells from the Reebok Functional range are available in weights ranging from 4kg up to 50kg, making them ideal for progressive functional training and increasing body strength.

Though kettlebells appear the same on the exterior, the material they are constructed with makes all the difference for performance training.

Cast iron kettlebells with a wide handle allow for a more comfortable grip for both one and two handed exercises such as the one-hand snatch or kettlebell swing. Durability, style and finish are important attributes important too; the high-quality Reebok Functional Kettlebell has a great feel, solid to hold and looks the part when lined up on the kettlebell rack. Plus, the flat base of the kettlebell provides stability and prevents roll when you're in between exercises.

With ample space between the top of the ball and the handle, the Reebok Kettlebell can be well-controlled for aerobic and anaerobic movements.
node.bulletpoints: Flat base provides stability and prevents roll, Reebok 4kg Kettlebell, Single piece cast iron construction for improved durability and finish, Weight range 4kg - 50kg, Wide handle allows for a secure two handed grip

Reebok lifting gloves for a solid grip.

The lightweight minimalist red gloves from the Reebok Men's Training range feature padded, textured palms which offer protection and an enhanced grip when using weights or functional fitness equipment such as pull up bars and battle ropes. The gloves are also manufactured to be resistant to abrasion.

Also available in medium, large and extra large sizes.

node.usp1:
Introducing the Reebok Dynamax® Medicine Ball - Individually hand-made.

Measuring 35cm (14) in diameter, the 2kg Reebok Dynamax® Medicine Ball is designed to withstand regular and rigorous use, but at the same time is forgiving enough for users to safely catch the ball from a high velocity. Its solid and reliable construction means it keeps its shape after prolonged use.

The medicine ball's stitched design features a black shell with red panels, displaying the Reebok and Dynamax® logos and weight clearly. Its flexible surface successfully aids grip during workouts and can be easily cleaned due to its moisture resistant attributes.

Dynamax® medicine balls were the first on the market and are the ball of choice, used by over 90% of professional sports franchises and NCAA athletes throughout the USA. The Reebok Dynamax® collaboration ensures the ball is meticulously designed and constructed for throwing and handling, whilst effectively absorbing high impact.

Reebok Dynamax® Medicine Balls are sold individually and are available in a variety of weight increments; 2kg, 3kg, 4kg, 5kg, 6kg, 7kg, 8kg, 9kg, 10kg, 11kg and 12kg. No matter what size you select for your skill level, med ball training is an ideal way to improve your explosiveness and core strength.
node.bulletpoints: Available in varying weights - 2kg, 3kg, 4kg, 5kg, 6kg, 7kg, 8kg, 9kg, 10kg, 11kg and 12kg, Dimensional stability - even after weeks, months and years of use the load will remain centred, Easy to clean, moisture resistant surface, Ergonomic design ensures the body remains in neutral spine, Forgiving and soft surface to aid grip during workouts, Holds its shape even after repeated use, Impact absorbing - the cored construction shields the user from impact, Individually hand-made - each ball has its own exact formula which is specific to each weight, Med ball training promotes athleticism, improves performance and power development, Quality of materials used result in the industrys longest unconditional warranty of 2 years, Reebok 2kg Medicine Ball - 35cm (14) diameter, Scuff resistant

node.usp1:
Measuring 23cm in diameter, the 4kg Reebok Slam Ball features a pliant, textured surface to reduce bounce and provide a better grip during workouts. Overhead weighted ball slams are a great exercise for working the entire body and releasing stress, but this explosive power can take its toll on the ball itself, that's why it's important to choose a ball that can stand unforgiving conditions and tough use.

Available in weight increments of 2kg, 3kg, 4kg, 5kg, 6kg, 8kg, 10kg and 12kg, the rubber-based slam ball can be used to target shoulders, triceps, abs, quads and glutes by slamming to the floor or to the wall. Whatever surface, the absorbent Reebok Slam Ball can handle the high impact.

Add a new dimension to your functional training by incorporating the Reebok Slam Ball.
node.bulletpoints: Absorbent design for regular, high impact functional training, Pliant, textured surface to reduce bounce and provide a better grip during workouts, Reebok 4kg Slam Ball - 23cm diameter, Sand filling provides a dynamic, weighted movement, Targets shoulders, triceps, abs, quads and glutes

node.usp1:
Plyometrics, otherwise known as jump training, is designed to help athletes of all levels build power and explosiveness.

Using the PlyoStack, part of the Reebok Functional range, you can increase leg strength, stamina and jumping form, which ultimately leads to improved performance for specific sports and even faster sprint times. The Reebok PlyoStack can also be used as a tactile cue to gauge and improve the depth of your squat.

Aim high, jump high - the Reebok PlyoStack features a 5 tier design, with the double density foam platforms providing variable box jump heights of 7.5cm, 15cm, 30cm, 45.5cm and 61cm, enabling you to customise, aim high and set new records.

Though a highly popular type of training, box jumping is often met with concern for possible injury when using tougher wooden box materials which results in athletes not committing 100% to the jump. With those concerns and safety in mind, the Reebok PlyoStack is made to be stable yet soft enough to avoid shin or knee injuries. An ideal platform for a perfect landing, the foam plyo boxes are secured together with Velcro® straps, ensuring they don't slip when stacked.

With easy clean wipe down covers, you can keep your PlyoStack its peak condition.
node.bulletpoints: Anti-slip landing platform, Double density foam construction for a soft and stable platform, Easy clean wipe down covers with heavy duty zip closure, Ideal for plyometric training to increase explosive muscle power, Reebok PlyoStack - 5 tier design provides variable jump heights of 7.5cm, 15cm, 30cm, 45.5cm and 61cm, Suitable for beginners to improve technique as well as seasoned athletes, Velcro® straps secure tiers together adding extra stability whilst jumping

Using the PlyoStack, part of the Reebok Functional range, you can increase leg strength, stamina and jumping form, which ultimately leads to improved performance for specific sports and even faster sprint times. The Reebok PlyoStack can also be used as a tactile cue to gauge and improve the depth of your squat.

Aim high, jump high - the Reebok PlyoStack features a 5 tier design, with the double density foam platforms providing variable box jump heights of 7.5cm, 15cm, 30cm, 45.5cm and 61cm, enabling you to customise, aim high and set new records. Though a highly popular type of training, box jumping is often met with concern for possible injury when using tougher wooden box materials which results in athletes not committing 100% to the jump. With those concerns and safety in mind, the Reebok PlyoStack is made to be stable yet soft enough to avoid shin or knee injuries. An ideal platform for a perfect landing, the foam plyo boxes are secured together with Velcro® straps, ensuring they don't slip when stacked. With easy clean wipe down covers, you can keep your PlyoStack its peak condition. "
