Versatility at its very best.

Easy to assemble, the Reebok Home Rig is the centre for all functional training activity. The sturdy unit is constructed with highly durable solid steel, standing up to the toughest workouts and is ideal for bodyweight drills, including pull ups and suspension exercises, using the overhead crossbar.
node.bulletpoints: Dimensions: 123 (L) x 120 (W) x 234 (H), Integrated wheels for better manoeuvrability, Vertical rack offers smaller footprint

node.usp1:
The solid four-posted Reebok cage is the go-to piece of apparatus which can be configured in a number of ways to create a truly unique and challenging functional training station.

It features dedicated anchor points for functional training accessories such as resistance bands, whilst being spacious enough to accommodate a weightlifting bench and combat boxing bag to the rear of the cage.

Standing 224cm tall, the cages precision cut holes ensure easy accessory mounting and configuration. Plus, a medicine ball rebounder can be attached at an angle to the front and the cage doubles up as a multi-grip pull up station which can be used to work on bodyweight training.

The cage also features areas for Olympic bumper plate and Olympic barbell storage to complete the functional training experience.
node.bulletpoints: Dedicated anchor points for functional training accessories, Hub for functional training, Large enough to accommodate a weightlifting bench, Max. user weight: 135kg, Multi-grip pull up station, Olympic bumper plate and barbell storage, Setup dimensions: 193 (L) x 200 (W) x 224 (H)
node.certificationenclass: EN 957-1 - General safety requirement and test methods,EN 957-2 - Strength training equipment, additional specific safety requirements and test methods

node.usp1:
Target any muscle group simply and effectively with the light resistance tube from Reebok.

Featuring comfort grip handles with three interchangeable resistance levels (sold individually); the resistance band assists with strengthening multiple muscle groups at one time.

As a versatile piece of equipment, there are a plethora of exercises, both upper and lower body, which can be performed at home using the Reebok tube.

The Reebok Resistance Tube for women is also available in medium and heavy variants to intensify your exercises.
node.bulletpoints: Blue/grey, Helps to strengthen and tone multiple muscle groups, Ideal for both upper and lower body exercises, Light Reebok Resistance Tube with soft grip handles

node.usp1:
The Reebok Training Band is a versatile product allowing you to perform a variety of strength and fitness exercises. And, its portability also means you can perform those exercises anytime, anywhere.

The number of different exercises you can do with a resistance band is phenomenal. For the legs, front squats, leg extensions and lateral band walks are just a few of many exercises, and for the back, bent-over rows, lying pullovers and lat pulldowns. Though it doesn't end there. You can work your chest, shoulders, arms and core for a full-body resistance band workout.

With two bands of low and medium resistance included, you can choose the band for the level of intensity required for each move.
node.usp2: 180cm - 15cm - 0.5cm is the black band dimensions 180cm - 15cm - 0.35cm is the grey band dimensions
node.bulletpoints: 1.8m long, Reebok Training Bands - Pack of two; low and medium resistance levels, Strong and durable material, Versatile product for a variety of exercises

node.usp1:
Reebok Power Tube Set - A versatile piece of equipment for working upper and lower body.

Target any muscle group simply and effectively with the Power Tube Set from Reebok. Featuring comfortable foam grip handles with three interchangeable resistance levels, the resistance bands assist with strenghtening multiple muscle groups at one time. There are a plethora of exercises, both upper and lower body, that can be performed using the set.
node.bulletpoints: Assists with strengthening multiple muscle groups, Foam grip handles with 3 interchangeable resistance levels, Ideal for upper and lower body exercises

node.usp1:
Go the extra distance.

For longer distance running, particularly on warmer days, a waist belt which can hold multiple bottles is a convenient and hassle-free piece of kit to take with you on your trail adventure.

The Reebok Distance Waist Belt can carry four 200ml bottles which is ideal if you want to take different types of fluids on your run, plus it features multiple water resistant storage compartments for stashing additional personal items such as your keys and a fuelling snack.

Its adjustable 1" wide waist belt keeps everything secure and comfortable, whilst the integrated and shock-absorbing padding on the reverse prevents the running belt bouncing around throughout your run.

Tried and tested, the black Reebok Distance Waist Belt is a durable and dependable running accessory which lets you focus on going the extra distance.
node.bulletpoints: 4 x 200ml bottle holders, Adjustable 1" wide waist belt with buckle for secure and comfortable fit, Adjustable size : Minimum 24" - Maximum 53", Integrated closed-cell padding on reverse for comfort and padded shock absorption, Long distance running waist belt, Multiple water resistant storage compartments

node.usp1:
Be safe, comfortable and prepared for sprint training.

Wear it on your back or front - however you want to wear it, the lightweight Reebok Sprint Storage Belt is an ideal running accessory to store essential items whilst running, and has been designed more specifically for high intensity training.

With a large high contrast reflective area for maximum visibility in low light, the sprint belt's buckle waistband can be adjusted to fit perfectly on your hips, preventing bounce and chafing. And that's important when you're moving fast.

In the pouch of the belt you'll also find a lined zip compartment for your valuables and an integrated headphone access point so you can easily select your running playlist, plug in and go.
node.bulletpoints: Adjustable buckle waistband for secure, comfortable fit, Adjustable Size: Minimum 25" - Maximum 40", Integrated headphone access point, Large high contrast reflective area for maximum visibility, Lined zip compartment for safe storage of valuables, Sprint Running Storage Belt

node.usp1:
A sleek way to carry essentials whilst running.

A longer belt pocket makes the Reebok Running Storage Belt perfect for holding larger personal devices as well as your keys and perhaps a mid-run snack or two. The storage compartments are water resistant too meaning your belongings will be protected from the elements.

With a large high contrast reflective area for maximum visibility in low light, the storage belt's buckle waistband can be adjusted to fit perfectly on your hips, preventing bounce and chafing. That's important when you're moving fast, climbing hills or tackling tough terrain.

In the pouch of the belt you'll also find an integrated headphone access point so you can easily select your running playlist, plug in and go.
node.bulletpoints: Adjustable buckle waistband for secure, comfortable fit, Adjustable Size: Minimum 24" - Maximum 44", High contrast reflective area for maximum visibility, Integrated headphone access point, Multiple water resistant storage compartment, Running Storage Belt

node.usp1:
In it for the long haul.

It's well known that hydration plays a fundamental part in your performance, especially for endurance activities; however it's not always ideal to carry lumbersome baggage, stop, pull out a water bottle and start back up again on your running trail.

The Endurance Hydration Backpack from Reebok offers a convenient and effective way to hydrate whilst on the move, thanks to its easy-to-access 2L hydration pack with bite valve. This valve is both easy to remove and easy to clean after use.

Fully waterproof, the Reebok running backpack features a large main compartment plus 5 internal pockets and a hydration sleeve with zips, so there's plenty of storage to keep all of your essentials safe and secure for your long-distance run. You'll also be able to reach your smaller valuables and energy snacks via the bag's easy access side pockets. Altogether, the bag's full capacity is 27L.

Ergonomically designed, the Endurance Hydration Backpack features an adjustable padded shoulder plus waist straps, enabling the bag to mould to the shape of your back whilst remaining secure and stable throughout your run. What's more, as the sun's setting, you can add an LED light to your backpack using the integrated light bracket for added visibility for the duration of your run.

Whether you're a recreational endurance runner or small day-hiker, the Reebok Endurance Hydration Backpack is a highly functional trail bag that doesn't compromise on comfort or practicality.
node.bulletpoints: Adjustable padded shoulder and waist straps for secure yet free movement, Bite valve for controlled hydration, Clip loops on shoulder straps and integrated light bracket for quick LED attachment, Large main compartment plus 5 internal pockets and hydration sleeve, plus easy access side pockets for valuables/nutrition, Waterproof Endurance Hydration Backpack - 27L total bag capacity with 2L capacity hydration pack

node.usp1:
Stay safe, be seen, run the night.

Created using a lightweight and breathable high visibility fabric, the small/medium Reebok running vest is ideal for late evening and night time runs, ensuring you are seen by vehicles, pedestrians and fellow runners.

The mesh lining provides a comfortable fit and its cut away design allows for breathability and a full range of movement during your run. Plus, it can be adjusted to fit using the Velcro® fastenings.

Also available in Large/Extra Large.

With a reversible yellow and black design, you can wear the running headband your way.

The prominent reflective Reebok logo stands out at night for added visibility whilst out running in low light conditions, and its contoured design ensures your ears are kept well covered from the elements during cold weather training.

Made from a double layer fabric, the Reebok Headband is a comfortable and protective running accessory that doesn't compromise on style.

One Size fits all.

The prominent reflective Reebok logo stands out at night for added visibility whilst out running in low light conditions, and its contoured design ensures your ears are kept well covered from the elements.

node.usp1:
Lighten up your run.

As the days get shorter through the winter months, you'll want to stock up on reliable visibility accessories when indulging in nocturnal trail running.

The Reebok LED Head Lights are ideal for both on and off-road running, providing a robust beam for every type of trail. Featuring a high powered, 110 lumen head torch, adjustable to a 90 degree angle for targeted beam focus, your path will be illuminated, with more distant objects lit up along the way.

The running head lights offer 3 light modes; high beam, dimmed and flashing, so you can select the level of lighting required for your run and the lighting conditions outside.

Its inclusive clip-on rear LED light has 3 settings, and the elasticated running headband with lights can be adjusted to a comfortable position.
node.bulletpoints: 3 light modes: high beam, dimmed and flashing, Adjustable elasticated comfort strap, High powered 110 lumen head torch, adjustable to a 90 degree angle for targeted beam focus, Inclusive clip-on rear LED light with 3 settings, LED Head Lights, ideal for on and off road running

node.usp1:
Hands-free hydration.

The 200ml capacity Wrist Water Bottle from the Reebok Running range features an anti-drip sports lock cap to avoid spillages and integrated into the water bottle's handle is a water resistant zip pocket for keeping small items safe.

Contoured to fit comfortably to your wrist with added Velcro® wrist wrap, the BPA free water bottle is secure in your palm for the duration of your run.

With your comfort in mind, the Reebok Wrist Water Bottle is the perfect accessory for a hassle-free run.
node.bulletpoints: 200ml capacity with anti-drip sports lock cap, Added Velcro® wrist strap ensures bottle is secure in your palm, BPA free, Integrated water resistant zip pocket for safe storage, Wrist Water Bottle

node.usp1:
The 300ml capacity Reebok Running Water Bottle has been ergonomically designed to ensure you remain a comfortable and confident grip on the handle whilst running.

With an anti-drip sports lock cap, the trusted handheld water bottle ensures no spillages.
node.bulletpoints: 300ml capacity with anti-drip sports lock cap, BPA free, Ergonomic design for comfortable grip whilst running, Running Water Bottle, See-through design allows you to keep track of remaining fluid

node.usp1:
Something as small, lightweight and seemingly simple as a pair of running gloves can really make all the difference on a trail run.

Whether you're braving the harsher elements into elevation or in and out of shade on a cooler day, the Reebok Thermal Running gloves with an inner fleece lining are a must-have for winter running and can help regulate your body temperature.

With a textured palm for enhanced grip, whether that's on your water bottle, mobile device or rock scrambling to get to the top, the gloves keep you warm, comfortable and prepared for all conditions.

The integrated Smart Touch technology means you'll be able to use your touchscreen phone or mp3 player without needing to take the gloves off, whilst the contrasting black and yellow design ensures you're seen by motorists in the dark.

Also available in medium and large.
node.bulletpoints: Contrasting black and yellow design for added visibility, Inner fleece lined for added warmth whilst cold weather training, Integrated Smart Touch technology for use with touch screen devices, Textured palm for enhanced grip, Thermal Running Gloves S

node.usp1:
The running glove for all conditions.

Something as small, lightweight and seemingly simple as a pair of running gloves can really make all the difference on a trail run, especially when the weather can be unpredictable.

With a textured palm for enhanced grip, whether that's holding on to your water bottle, mobile device or rock scrambling to get to the top, the Reebok running gloves are comfortable and durable for all conditions.

The feature that makes the gloves 'All-Weather' is the retractable wind and waterproof hood which is discreetly stored inside the wrist of the glove. The hood is easily removed and pulled over the fingers to keep your hands snug inside the glove, transforming the gloves into a mitt.

Beyond the luminous yellow material, the gloves incorporate reflective strips adding further visibility to motorists whilst night-time running.

Also available in medium and large.

node.usp1:
Compression garments are typically used to assist in blood circulation, reduce blood lactate concentration during running and control the amount of muscle oscillation that results from pounding during running.

The Reebok Compression Arm Sleeve, available in small, medium, large and extra large sizes (sold separately), is designed to help you perform at your best by increasing oxygen and blood flow, enabling your muscles to recover quickly after running.

The sleeve's compression fit contours to your arm shape for maximum muscle support and its stretch bonded cuffs keep it secure throughout your run. The inner breathable fleece of the sleeve successfully wicks away sweat, yet provides warmth in cold weather too.

For increased visibility, the Reebok Arm Compression Sleeve features a highly reflective and stylish honeycomb design.
node.bulletpoints: Compression Arm Sleeve S, Compression fit contours to the body for maximum muscle support, Highly reflective honeycomb design for increased visibility, Inner breathable fleece wicks away sweat and provides warmth in cold weather, Stretch bonded cuffs for a secure fit

node.bulletpoints: Compression Arm Sleeve L, Compression fit contours to the body for maximum muscle support, Highly reflective honeycomb design for increased visibility, Inner breathable fleece wicks away sweat and provides warmth in cold weather, Stretch bonded cuffs for a secure fit

The Reebok Compression Arm Sleeve, available in small, medium, large and extra large sizes (sold separately), is designed to help you perform at your best by increasing oxygen and blood flow, enabling your muscles to recover quickly after running.

node.usp1:
Commonly seen in CrossFit, the Reebok branded Battling Rope is a heavy-duty, 10m long polyester rope with rubber grips at each end for a strong hold. Battling ropes typically enhance an athlete's grip, strength and overall levels of functional training capacity by building up to a peak heart rate through a variety of motions.

5cm thick, the Reebok rope can be wrapped around an anchor point whilst the user holds the rope at the other end to perform high intensity, muscle-building rope exercises such as the double wave, alternating wave, shoulder circles and snakes on the floor. These are just a few of the possible exercises you can perform from a range of wave, slam, compound and explosive movements.

With constant motion of the rope battling with the floor, the Reebok Battling Rope is extremely durable in design and can stand up to frequent use.

Change-up or add a new metabolic element to your strength training with the heavy-duty Reebok Battling Rope.
node.bulletpoints: 3.8cm rope diameter, Creates a high intensity cardio and strength workout, Extremely durable design, Reebok Battling Rope - Heavy 10m long polyester rope, Rubber grips at each end for better hold

node.usp1:
The fully adjustable, 3m durable coated steel cable allows you to set the Reebok Premium Speed Rope to your required length based on height and capability.

Its weighted handles with textured grip feature an integrated ball bearing mechanism to ensure a super quick, smooth rotational motion.

Combining sophisticated technology and sleek design, the black Reebok Premium Speed Rope is a classic piece of equipment for improving cardiovascular fitness and agility.
node.bulletpoints: 2.5mm Allen key adjustment, 3m quick and easy adjustable length, Black, Durable coated steel cable, Reebok Premium Speed Rope with smooth ball bearing within handle, Textured grip

node.usp1:
The fully adjustable, 3.1m durable coated steel cable allows you to set the Reebok Premium Speed Rope to your required length based on height and capability.

Its weighted handles with textured grip feature an integrated ball bearing mechanism to ensure a super quick, smooth rotational motion.

Combining sophisticated technology and sleek design, the red Reebok Premium Speed Rope is a classic piece of equipment for improving cardiovascular fitness and agility.
node.bulletpoints: 2.5mm Allen key adjustment, 3.1m quick and easy adjustable length, Durable coated steel cable, Red, Reebok Premium Speed Rope with smooth ball bearing within handle, Textured grip

node.usp1:
Agility poles are a key piece of equipment for team athletes to develop their agility, speed and coordination on the pitch.

The adidas Agility Poles are high visibility, impact resistant and flexible poles that are designed to be spiked in to the ground.

They can be used for agility training when spiked close together in a zig zag format and also to define the playing field.

The addition of the clips means you can set up your agility poles in a number of ways, from mid-sized goals to hurdles and angled targets.
node.bulletpoints: Can be used with adidas training net, agility bases and corner flags (sold separately), Designed to be spiked into the ground, High visibility, impact resistant, flexible poles 186cm in height, Ideal for agility training and defining the playing field, The pole set includes 6 poles and 6 spikes
node.certificationenclass: EN 957-1 - General safety requirement and test methods

node.usp1:
Two contrasting configurations make the adidas pop up goal fun, challenging and highly productive for training or simply messing around with a football.

With the 'goal' up you can shoot and score into the back of the net, then by simply flipping the frame in the 'hole' up mode, you have a reduced sized target to help improve accuracy.

Easy to set up and just as easy to store away by folding into a flat position, the adidas 4ft Pop Up Goal is an excellent tool for training, passing and shooting drills.
node.bulletpoints: 2 different configurations - goal and target, Impact resistant poles, Lightweight mesh and flexible, Target area designed to improve shooting accuracy

node.usp1:

Easy to set up and just as easy to store away by folding into a flat position, the adidas 6ft Pop Up Goal is an excellent tool for training, passing and shooting drills.
node.bulletpoints: 2 different configurations - goal and target, Impact resistant poles, Lightweight mesh and flexible, Target area designed to improve shooting accuracy

node.usp1:
To develop skill you need to practice movements time after time. Improve shooting, passing, freestyle football tricks, ball control and throw-ins with the adidas soccer trainer which lets you retrieve the ball whilst standing still.

Simply put your size 3, 4 or 5 ball into the neoprene 'ball glove' and wrap the cuff around your wrist or ankle and let your training begin.

For the most aggressive football drills, the adidas Soccer Trainer stretches up to 175cm, giving you just enough freedom to practise without restricting you.
node.bulletpoints: Adjustable elastic cord (90cm - 175cm), Interchangeable wrist / ankle strap, Stretch your soccer skills to the limit without needing to retrieve the ball, Suitable for size 3, 4 or 5 balls

node.usp1:
The adidas Training Net is a useful piece of soccer equipment used to improve ball control and skills, plus training manoeuvres such as head tennis and one touch tennis.

Training Net is set at a height of 180cm when used in conjunction with adidas agility poles.

The kit includes the Training Net itself, tie down ropes and four securing turf stakes.
node.bulletpoints: Kit includes Training Net, tie down guide ropes and 4 turf stakes, Set height of 180cm using the adidas Agility Poles, Used to improve ball control and skills, plus training manoeuvres

node.usp1: Regulation sized corner flags for use with adidas agility poles. The impact resistant pole is set in to a weighted base enabling the UV resistant flags to be used indoors and out. Use them as markers, targets and obstacles when training as a team or on your own.
node.bulletpoints: 45 x 35cm, Set of 4 regulation sized flags, To be used with adidas agility poles

node.usp1: Agility bases for use with the adidas agility poles during speed and agility drills. These come as a set of two and can be filled with sand or water to ensure they stay in place during training.
node.bulletpoints: Self-fill (with sand or water) weighted bases, Set of 2 agility bases, To be used with adidas agility poles

node.usp1:
High quality equipment bags are an essential part of maintaining a well-organised team.

Suitable for all footballs, rugby balls, netballs and more, the strong adidas Equipment Bag is manufactured with fabric and mesh and features a simple and secure drawstring closure to keep all equipment compact within.

The adidas equipment bag is a fundamental team sports accessory to store and transport kit easily to and from the training ground.
node.bulletpoints: Black and red with adidas logo, Designed to easily transport equipment to and from the training ground, Fabric and mesh design with secure drawstring closure, Suitable for all footballs, rugby balls, netballs and more

node.usp1:
On your marks, get set.

Improve your ball skills with the adidas training markers. In bold colours and numbered 1 to 10, the adidas marker set can be used indoors and outdoors, to teach best positioning on the playing field. The circular markers can be used to designate field or court positions and mark distances. Sold as a set of 10.
node.bulletpoints: Assorted colours and adidas logo, Diameter: 23cm, Ideal for positioning on the field and marking distance, Training markers numbered 1-10

node.usp1:
With the Reebok Pro Flat Bench, the possibilities are endless. Featuring high density foam cushioning, the 10" x 47.5" bench provides a comfortable and sturdy surface for weightlifting, with a 17" ground clearance for greater stability and reduction of back arch through your lift.

Taking the weight bench back to basics, the Reebok Pro Flat Bench is straight forward to assemble whilst its integrated wheels and handle make it easy to manoeuvre.

For all levels of intensity and weight, the Reebok Flat Bench is a rock solid foundation for your workout.
node.bulletpoints: 10" x 47.5" back support, 17" ground clearance provides greater stability and reduces back arch when lifting, Easy to assemble, Integrated wheels and handle for easy transport and stable, non-slip feet, Reebok Pro Flat Bench with high density foam cushioning with easy wipe clean surface

node.usp1:
The Reebok Utility Bench provides the ultimate in versatile weight training. With 7 adjustable angles and 3 seat adjustments via a quick pull rod mechanism, the bench can be adapted to each individual athlete's workout preferences. Featuring high density foam cushioning, the bench can be kept in peak condition thanks to its easy wipe clean surface.

10" x 52", the compact Reebok Utility Bench features integrated wheels and handle for easy manoeuvrability and once situated its non-slip feet will keep it in place. The bench's 17" ground clearance offers greater stability and reduction of back arch through your lift.

For all levels of intensity and weight, the Reebok Utility Bench is a rock solid foundation for your workout.
node.bulletpoints: 10" x 52" back support, 17" ground clearance provides greater stability and reduces back arch when lifting, Easy to assemble Reebok Utility Bench - 7 adjustable angles and 3 seat adjustments via a quick pull rod mechanism, High density foam cushioning with easy wipe clean surface, Integrated wheels and handle for easy transport plus stable, non-slip feet

node.usp1:
The Reebok Lifting Platform provides a dedicated, solid and secure space for powerlifting and weight training circuits. 24 individual dense rubber tiles make up the 2m x 3m lifting platform which bolts securely into place within the interlocking steel frame.

Significantly reducing impact noise when lifting and dropping weights, the shock-absorbing rubber tiles prevent damage to floors and wear and tear on your strength training equipment.

Easy to assemble and tough enough for heavy-duty Olympic powerlifting sessions day-after-day, the Reebok Lifting Platform offers everything you need and much more. This is your territory, your dedicated zone and with a good platform underfoot, there's nothing to stop you beating your personal best.
node.bulletpoints: Creates a 2m x 3m space ideal for powerlifting and weight training circuits, Dense rubber material prevents damage to floors, Reduces impact noise when lifting and dropping, Reebok Lifting Platform - 24 piece construction with interlocking steel frame

node.usp1:
The Reebok Free Standing Torso Trainer is a versatile training tool ideal for total body strength and power workouts, enabling the user to add rotation to power moves.

The ground-based torso trainer features a 50mm diameter barbell pivoting sleeve with hand tighten screw clamp to keep the bar securely in place, whilst its triangular design base provides even further stability throughout your workout. Portable for indoor or outdoor training, you can add further weight to your torso unit using the 2 weight posts.

A full 360 degree pivot provides an increased range of motion for dynamic movements such as torso twists, rotations and shoulder presses, making it a great tool for strength training and building power in both the lower and upper body. Compatible with other Reebok Functional training equipment including the Core Trainer Bar and Single Row Olympic Bar attachment, the Torso Trainer is effective in targeting different muscles.
node.bulletpoints: 2 weight posts and solid triangular design provides superior stability, 50mm diameter barbell sleeve with hand tighten screw clamp, Compatible with the Core Trainer Bar and Single Row Olympic Bar Attachment to target different muscles, Full 360 degree pivot on sleeve for increased range of motion, Reebok free standing torso trainer unit for versatile weight training

node.usp1:
Supporting up to 125kg in bodyweight, the Reebok Parallette Bars are 25" (64cm) in length with a 13" (33cm) elevation and are an indispensable piece of training equipment.

You certainly don't have to be a trained gymnast to start using parallette bars, but they do provide amazing strength training benefits including improved upper body strength, forward and vertical pressing power, as well as stronger lats, forearms and core.

Elevating you 13" off the ground, the solid bars allow for a deeper range of motion for common moves such as dips, push-ups, tuck sits, v-sits and handstand push-ups, and throughout any move, the Reebok Parallette Bars keep their position thanks to their textured flat feet.

Built to last, you can feel the quality of the 30mm diameter steel handles as you perform your parallette drills. The number of exercises that can be performed using just this one piece of kit is outstanding making the Reebok Parallette Bars an ideal tool to incorporate into your functional training programme.
node.bulletpoints: 125kg max. user weight, 25" (64cm) in length, 13" (33cm) elevation, 30mm diameter hollow steel handles, Parallette Bars - Utilises bodyweight for a variety strength training workouts, Textured flat feet reduces slip and movement

node.usp1:
Transform your regular weight bar routine with the Core Trainer Bar from Reebok.

Featuring a 50mm sleeve suitable for all Olympic bars, the Reebok Core Trainer Bar helps you to improve your upper body strength, particularly in the back and shoulders. With comfortable angled grips, 60cm apart, you can perform a variety of core-centric exercises such as cable rows and barbell bent over rows by retracting your shoulders and flexing your elbows whilst engaging your core.

The core trainer bar's reversible design enables you to target two separate muscle groups and change up your routine, making it an ideal attachment to incorporate into your functional training workout.
node.bulletpoints: 50mm sleeve suitable for all Olympic bars, Comfortable, angled hand grips with 60cm distance in between, Core Trainer Bar, Provides an effective core, shoulder and back workout, Reversible design to target two separate muscle groups

A valuable training accessory in the arsenal of many athletes, the Full Finger Functional Gloves from Reebok offer complete protection for increased control and grip during functional training.

With an integrated 3" wide wrist strap, the gloves provide an all-in-one solution providing added stability during heavy lifting, without the need for three individual accessories for wrist support, grip and hand protection.

The Full Finger Functional Glove features a high-grip palm and breathable yet hardwearing upper fabric, with the addition of an adjustable Velcro® closure for a secure fit. For maximum durability, the glove also incorporates leather fingertip protectors and reinforced thumb grip.

The Reebok Gloves are available in small, medium, large and extra-large.
node.bulletpoints: Adjustable Velcro® closure for secure fit, plus leather fingertip protectors and reinforced thumb grip for maximum durability, Breathable but hardwearing upper fabric, High grip palm, Integrated 3" wide wrist strap for added stability during heavy lifting, Reebok Full Finger Gloves provides full finger protection to increase control and grip during functional training

The strong, lightweight and practical 75cl Reebok Water Bottle includes a handy carabiner clip which means you'll always be able to keep water in easy reach. Simply clip it to your belt, bag or other item of choice for a convenient H2O top-up.

Keeping its contents fresh for hours at a time, the Reebok water bottle is also leak-proof thanks to its screw cap which ensures no spillages.

The lightweight aluminium sports water bottle with an anti-corrosion inner coating is not only durable, but remains simple and stylish in design with a prominent Reebok logo.
node.bulletpoints: 750ml, BPA Free, Carry handle, Flip lid and screw ensuring no spillages, Lightweight aluminium design and anti-corosion inner coating

node.usp1:
The ideal addition to your home gym or fitness studio, the adidas Training Bench offers stand-out design and sturdy construction in one compact piece of apparatus.

Easy to adjust, the adidas Training Bench also boasts a preacher curl to isolate the biceps and a mounted padded leg developer to perform leg extensions and curls, focusing on your quads and hamstrings respectively. This deluxe add-on enables you to perform a range of exercises whilst the bench is in a flat position.

Adding further versatility to your training programme, the bench can be adjusted to flat, incline and decline positions - the latter position is perhaps often overlooked but it is the easiest way of targeting specific muscles in the chest and upper body. Using the bench at different angles encourages multiple muscle engagement, so you can work the muscles you want for a more defined and sculpted physique.

Solid in construction with floor level adjustment, as well as being compact in size, the Training Bench doesn't take up too much space and works hand-in-hand with dumbbells, barbells and most squat stands and power racks. Take your floor based exercises up a notch and perform them on the bench so you can work your abs on a supportive and comfortable platform.

Ideal for users of all levels, beginners or more experienced, the adidas Training Bench is a must-have tool in any keen fitness enthusiast's arsenal.
node.bulletpoints: Easily adjustable to flat, incline and decline positions, Floor level adjustment for added stability, Includes preacher curl for targeting biceps, Leg extension with weight plate holder (Max. weight 45kg), Max. user weight 135kg
node.certificationenclass: EN 957-1 - General safety requirement and test methods,EN 957-2 - Strength training equipment, additional specific safety requirements and test methods

node.usp1:
Set at a slope to max out your training efficiency, the adidas bench is the essential ab workout tool.

Providing a solid steel platform to work off, the slim leg grips fit the curvature of your body comfortably and give you the full range of motion unhindered. These grips can also be tailored to ensure you keep your core alignment solid.

The bench is a requirement in any ab workout and is the best way to focus on the core muscles in the torso, keeping them constantly engaged. The decline works well in keeping your core unbalanced, providing you with a fuller range of motion - but for a complete and thorough ab workout, use medicine balls and dumbbells whilst using the bench to direct the burn.
node.bulletpoints: Adjustable ankle grip settings, Dimensions: 133 (L) x 34 (W) x 70cm (H), High impact ankle foam grip, Padded seat and back support, Tough steel frame
node.certificationenclass: EN 957-1 - General safety requirement and test methods

node.usp1:
The Essential Utility Bench is a highly popular piece of gym equipment suitable for performing classic free weight exercises such as bench press, chest press or shoulder press.

The variety of angled and flat positions enable you to hit numerous muscles in your upper body, with the supportive back pad providing a good range of motion through exercises. These are small adjustments that will have a big impact on results. The decline position is perhaps often overlooked but it is the easiest way of targeting specific muscles in the chest and upper body.

Your bench workout doesn't have to be limited to lying on your back though. Use the basic methods that have served gym goers well for decades; tricep dips, elevated lunges, bridging exercises or single arm rows in a standing position alongside the bench. Its versatility goes a long way so use the bench in the ways best suited for you.

With its scratch resistant tough steel frame the Utility Bench is a durable and stable piece of equipment for regular use. The padded seat and high impact ankle and knee foam supports ensure added comfort, while the push and pull back support locking system enables efficient modification of the incline position.

Taking transformation and versatility one step further, the bench can be easily converted into a sit up bench at the required incline and when your workout is complete, it folds flat (23cm deep) to save on essential floor space in the home.

To complete your home gym, team up with dumbbells and a weight rack.
node.bulletpoints: 2 in 1 dumbbell and ab bench with flat, decline and 5 x incline settings, Converts into a sit up bench, Extremely compact when folded, only 23cm deep, Incorporated foam rollers for knee and ankle support, Maximum user weight 100kg
node.certificationenclass: EN 957-1 - General safety requirement and test methods

node.usp1:
The adidas Essential Multi-Purpose Bench provides a complete upper and lower body workout in a compact bench. Its padded back support combined with a durable frame allows you to push yourself with confidence.

The bench can be used to perform a variety of exercises. It also offers the opportunity for barbell exercises and chest presses using the built-in barbell rack as well as the more classic free weight movements. Use the incline options to target specific muscle groups while you work.

Variety in training is key. This bench comes with everything you need to work the entire body, allowing for an extensive variety of exercises. Use the bench as your platform to create your own workout and mix up exercises to keep motivated and inspired for the next.

The adidas Essential Multi-Purpose Bench was designed with a relatively small footprint to ensure it can be used in the smallest of rooms without compromising on functionality.
node.bulletpoints: Built-in barbell rack, Dimensions: 137 (L) x 70 (W) x 114 (H), Padded seat/back support with 3 incline levels

The bench can be used to perform a variety of exercises. It also offers the opportunity for barbell exercises and chest presses using the built-in barbell rack as well as the more classic free weight movements. The Pro Bench also features a padded Preacher Curl attachment to isolate the biceps, triceps and forearm muscles.

All-in-all, the bench comes with everything you need to work the entire body, allowing for an extensive variety of exercises - and variety in weight training is key. Use the bench as your platform to create your own workout and mix up exercises to keep motivated and inspired for the next.

node.usp1:
The adidas Essential Elite Station is a comprehensive multi-function bench boasting three position bar holders, lat and preacher curl attachments, as well as a leg curl and extension bar. The foam rollers on the attachment provide added comfort and support for knees and ankles when performing leg curls.

Providing numerous exercise opportunities, the Elite Station can be used for training both upper and lower body to focus on specific muscle goals. The bench itself can be converted into a sit up bench as well as offering flat, decline and 3 incline position settings for each exercise.

Designed to optimise space, the station is extremely compact being only 21cm deep when folded. Its relatively small footprint is surprising considering its versatility. Easy to set up and assemble, the Essential Station is a solid gym quality bench with thick and comfortable foam cushioning for regular weight training.
node.bulletpoints: Extremely compact when folded only 21cm deep, Flat, decline and 3 x incline settings and 3 position bar holders, Lat and preacher curl attachments with foam rollers for knee and ankle support (max lat pull down is 35kg), Leg curl and extension bar, Ultimate Multi-Function Bench, can be converted into sit up bench
node.certificationenclass: EN 957-1 - General safety requirement and test methods,EN 957-2 - Strength training equipment, additional specific safety requirements and test methods,EN 957-4 - Strength training benches, additional specific safety requirements and test methods

node.usp1:
The centrepiece of your workout, the adidas Essential Strength Bench is designed to enable you to incorporate a variety of exercises into your routine whilst remaining comfortable, practical and streamlined in design. With three levels of incline, the opportunities really are endless.

Providing a flexible workout station with use of a barbell rack and leg curl/thigh extension attachment, the adidas workout bench is ideal for both upper and lower body training. The separate squat rack can be used in conjunction with the bench holding the barbell or standalone as a piece of equipment when working specifically on squatting technique.

With a variety of weight discs included (up to 45kg) plus a 2kg barbell, you have everything you need to set up your home workout.
node.bulletpoints: 45kg weight stack included; 2 x 10kg, 2 x 7.5kg, 2 x 5kg weight discs, Built-in barbell rack with 2kg 127cm long Barbell, Leg curl and thigh extension with weight plate holder - gap between uprights is 65cm, Max bench press weight 70kg including bar, Padded seat and back support - Adjustable back support with three levels of incline

node.usp1:
Though a tool of choice for competitive powerlifters and Olympic weightlifters, barbell training is the ideal method for both beginners and the experienced. Lifting a barbell loaded with heavy weights is a real test of strength and power.

Weight needn't just be practical; they can also be aesthetically stunning. The adidas Olympic Weight plates are coated in powder to make them both durable and dynamic.

The Olympic Plate range includes a variety of weights from 1.25kg up to 20kg (sold separately) and fit securely onto 50mm Olympic Bars with plate collars. Steel strong, the plate is rubber coated to resist impact and protect flooring, though it's always advised to use a protective training mat when lifting weights - just in case.

Variety is key to sustainable strength training. Mix up your sessions between lifting heavy and speed and endurance focused activities to stay productive.
node.bulletpoints: 50mm hole to fit onto Olympic bars, Powder coated to resist impact and protect floor, Solid steel 1.25kg Olympic Weight Plate

node.usp1: Keep your lifting area neat and tidy with the adidas Plate Rack. The weight tree is compact in design to ensure it can be kept close to a wall out of the way and the solid steel construction assures up to 5 25mm weight plates are stored securely - so load them on when your weight lifting workout is done.
node.bulletpoints: 5 individual 25mm weight pegs, A-frame style plate rack, Stores up to 25 adidas weight plates, Sturdy steel construction

node.usp1:
Squats are one of the most essential fundamentals to perfect if you want to be proficient with barbells, but concern for potential injury or pain in the neck caused by the bar resting on it can hinder your performance.

By adding a barbell pad to your barbell, you can embrace the popularity of HIIT (High Intensity Interval Training) by carrying out fast sequential sets of 'squat and press' without putting the bar down during the recovery phase. The soft foam pad will make this experience a little more bearable, enabling you to push yourself further. Try 20 seconds of exertion with just 10 seconds of partial recovery repeated 8 times to see just how more comfortable this move is with padding on your neck - making the bar more comfortable on the neck isn't cheating if it helps you to perform better!

The size of the pad (50cm) is optimal to ensure that not just the upper section of your neck is protected, but also the wider sections of your shoulders if you roll the bar a little further down your back when you get fatigued.

The pad fits securely on to all barbells in the adidas Strength range.
node.bulletpoints: 50cm barbell pad, Heavy duty material, Suitable for all adidas barbells

node.usp1:
Though a tool of choice for competitive powerlifters and Olympic weightlifters, barbell training is the ideal method for both beginners and the experienced. A barbell measures the body's ability to lift pure weight and is a real test of strength.

Back and front squats, deadlifts, bent-over rows, bench presses, cleans, jerks or snatches, the 6ft Straight Barbell is tough contender for all of those exercises, constructed with durable machined steel and featuring machine cut knurled hand sections for a strong grip.

The spin lock collars ensure secure fitting and machine loading space for weight discs. As you progress, you can add further weight, go beyond your comfort zone and reach new strength-based goals.
node.bulletpoints: 6ft Straight Barbell with spin lock collars for secure weight fit, Heavy duty steel construction, chrome finish, Non-slip knurled hand grip area, Suitable for 25mm plates

node.usp1:
Though a tool of choice for competitive powerlifters and Olympic weightlifters, barbell training is the ideal method for both beginners and the experienced. A barbell measures the body's ability to lift pure weight and is a real test of strength and power.

The 7ft Olympic Bar is not just a 'bar'. It is an item of precision engineering, beautifully designed to reduce torsional force, with metal sleeves at the ends of the bar and ball bearings fitted inside to allow the Olympic weights to spin when the bar is lifted at speed.

Weight training is a sure-fire way to define your body and improve muscular endurance - if it's good enough for Olympic weightlifters, it's good enough for you.
node.bulletpoints: 7ft Olympic Barbell, Ball bearing sleeves provide smoother rotation, Heavy duty steel construction, chrome finish, Non-slip knurled hand grip area, Suitable for 50mm Olympic plates

node.usp1:
Considered to be one of the most effective methods to increase lean muscle mass, strength training is a fundamental aspect of any fitness programme and dumbbells are widely used as part of that.

The adidas Dumbbell Bar is tough, manufactured with durable machined steel construction. You can add weights of your choice (sold separately) to the 25mm dumbbell bar and keep them secure using the included spin lock collars. The spin lock system means you can change your weights over faster for a smooth transition between each exercise.
node.bulletpoints: 25mm Chrome Dumbbell Bar, Spin lock collars for swift weight changeover, Tough, durable steel bar

node.usp1:
The adidas 25mm Tricep Curl Bar is mid-length with a hammer grip configuration specifically designed to work your triceps and rear deltoids. This type of grip is considered to be the optimal hand position, keeping your arms aligned to target the triceps muscles during press, row and roll out exercises.

A curl bar places less stress on the wrists, with its curvature allowing your wrists to easily handle the weight load compared to a straight bar. Exercises performed with a close grip using the curl bar enable you to effectively target your triceps by isolating the rear upper arm.

For a complete and varied tricep workout, supplement your curl bar movements with tricep dips using a bench or stair and dumbbell kickbacks.

Constructed with tough, durable steel and manufactured with a non-slip knurled hand grip area, the adidas Tricep Curl Bar comes with spin lock collars. The spin lock system means you can change the weights (sold separately) over faster for a smooth transition between each exercise.
node.bulletpoints: 25mm Tricep Curl Bar, Non-slip knurled hand grip area, Spin lock collars for swift weight changeover, Tough, durable steel construction

node.usp1:
The adidas 25mm Bicep Curl Bar is mid-length with a semi-hammer grip configuration specifically designed to work your biceps, forearms and front deltoids. This type of grip is considered to be the optimal hand position, keeping your arms aligned to target the biceps muscles during curl, row and roll out exercises.

A staple in many bicep routines and used by fitness professionals worldwide, the bicep curl bar minimises pressure on your wrists to ensure you're relying solely on strength when lifting. Simply by changing up your grip you can perform different supersets which add intensity to your training routine.

Constructed with tough, durable steel and manufactured with a non-slip knurled hand grip area, the adidas Bicep Curl Bar comes with spin lock collars. The spin lock system means you can change the weights (sold separately) over faster for a smooth transition between each exercise.

For a complete and varied bicep workout, supplement your bicep curl bar movements with additional curls using alternative equipment such as dumbbells, barbells or incline weight benches.
node.bulletpoints: 25mm Bicep Curl Bar, Non-slip knurled hand grip area, Optimal curved design to target biceps, Spin lock collars for swift weight changeover, Tough, durable steel construction

node.usp1:
Though a tool of choice for competitive powerlifters and Olympic weightlifters, barbell training is the ideal method for both beginners and the experienced. A barbell measures the body's ability to lift pure weight and is a real test of strength and power.

The 50mm Solid Olympic Curl Bar is not just a 'bar'. It is an item of precision engineering, beautifully designed to reduce torsional force, with metal sleeves at the ends of the bar and ball bearings fitted inside to allow Olympic weights (sold separately) to spin when the bar is lifted at speed.

A mid-length bicep bar is designed specifically to work your biceps, forearms and front deltoids, promotes options for a variety of grips including a standard grip, close grip, wide grip and a reverse curl.

When in a seated position, lean forward slightly to pre-load the muscles and if you are working on 21's (where you only perform a small movement), make sure when you do the full range set that you really finish every repetition.

Did you know, your bicep muscles are approximately one third of the diameter of your arm? So to give a little extra attention to this muscle, superset with some full range curls followed straight after by push ups.

All adidas bars provide both stiffness and flex in their design so you can trust in the bar when you're lifting heavy.

Weight training is a sure-fire way to define your body and improve muscular endurance - if it's good enough for Olympic weightlifters, it's good enough for you.
node.bulletpoints: 50mm Solid Olympic Curl Bar, Chrome plated finish with rotating ends, Durable solid steel construction, Includes 2 weight plate collars

node.usp1:
Make a useful difference to each and every lift.

Considered an essential piece of equipment for powerlifters, lifting wraps are designed to provide you with the maximum support required for heavy lifts whilst ensuring optimal technique and maximal overload of the muscles.

Typically used for pressing, overhead lifting, power lifting and strongman training, the adidas Power Lifting Wraps offer greater stability and feature a thumb loop to keep the wraps in position throughout each lift.
node.bulletpoints: Hook and loop closure, Provides greater stability while pressing, overhead lifting, power lifting and strongman training, Thumb loop

node.usp1:
The small to medium 4" Leather Weightlifting Belt from adidas is designed to offer athletes maximum back and core support when performing heavy lifts.

71 - 89cm in length, the fully lined wide leather weightlifting belt features a built-in cushioned lumbar pad to help alleviate strain on the back muscles by keeping the back aligned during each lift. The belt's heavy duty double stitching makes it durable for consistent use while the metal buckle keeps it secure and adjustable to the appropriate size.

The adidas lumbar belt is non-restrictive and is particularly useful for performing weightlifting exercises such as deadlifts.
node.bulletpoints: 71cm - 89cm with metal buckle to select appropriate fit, Also available in L/XL and XXL sizes, Heavy duty stitching for prolonged use, Provides maximum back support when performing heavy lifts, S/M 4" leather weightlifting belt with integrated cushioned lumbar pad

node.usp1:

89 - 98cm in length, the fully lined wide leather weightlifting belt features a built-in cushioned lumbar pad to help alleviate strain on the back muscles by keeping the back aligned during each lift. The belt's heavy duty double stitching makes it durable for consistent use while the metal buckle keeps it secure and adjustable to the appropriate size.

The adidas lumbar belt is non-restrictive and is particularly useful for performing weightlifting exercises such as deadlifts.
node.bulletpoints: 89cm - 98cm with metal buckle to select appropriate fit, Also available in S/M and XXL sizes, Heavy duty stitching for prolonged use, L/XL 4" leather weightlifting belt with integrated cushioned lumbar pad, Provides maximum back support when performing heavy lifts

node.usp1:

98 - 116cm in length, the fully lined wide leather weightlifting belt features a built-in cushioned lumbar pad to help alleviate strain on the back muscles by keeping the back aligned during each lift. The belt's heavy duty double stitching makes it durable for consistent use while the metal buckle keeps it secure and adjustable to the appropriate size.

The adidas lumbar belt is non-restrictive and is particularly useful for performing weightlifting exercises such as deadlifts.
node.bulletpoints: 98cm - 116cm with metal buckle to select appropriate fit, Also available in S/M and L/XL sizes, Heavy duty stitching for prolonged use, Provides maximum back support when performing heavy lifts, XXL 4" leather weightlifting belt with integrated cushioned lumbar pad

node.usp1:
Adding metal to your grip can help you lift heavier weights than you ever dreamed of. The steel hooks are designed to help you increase the amount of weight that you can hold in your hands by taking the weight through the hooks rather than relying solely on the strength of your fingers. Nylon and Velcro® wrist straps create a firm yet comfortable fit that is adjustable to accommodate a range of wrist sizes.

Hook lifting straps are primarily designed to be used for lifts where the bar stays below head height, for example; rows, deadlifts, bent-over row and cleans are ideal exercises when you are using your heaviest weight in a training session.

The Velcro® wrist band is intended to wrap around your forearm rather than sit directly over the wrist joint. This allows your bones, muscles, ligaments and tendons to contribute to the strength activity rather than being restricted.
node.bulletpoints: Neoprene inside wrist strap for added comfort, Nylon material with extra wide Velcro® closure to support wrist, One size fits all, Steel hook to support heavy lifting, accommodating any size handle or bar

node.usp1:
Lifting straps are an excellent training aid to facilitate heavy lifting by providing a highly secure grip.

There is always risk of sacrificing form as fatigue sets in. Wearing the lifting straps, you can easily maintain or push your training to the next level by increasing the amount of weight on a bar.

With added neoprene padding, the tough and durable cotton straps sit comfortably and securely on your wrist and are ideal for all types of weightlifting.

The adidas Lifting Straps are supplied as a pair and come in one standard size.
node.bulletpoints: Added heavy-duty neoprene padding for extra comfort, Ideal for all types of weightlifting, One size fits all, Supplied as a pair, Tough and durable top quality cotton straps

node.usp1:
The XXL 4" Leather Weightlifting Belt from adidas is designed to offer athletes maximum back and core support when performing heavy lifts.

98 - 116cm in length, the fully lined wide leather weightlifting belt features a built-in cushioned lumbar pad to help alleviate strain on the back muscles by keeping the back aligned during each lift. The belt's heavy duty double stitching makes it durable for consistent use while the metal buckle keeps it secure and adjustable to the appropriate size.

The adidas lumbar belt is non-restrictive and is particularly useful for performing weightlifting exercises such as deadlifts.
node.bulletpoints: 98cm - 116cm with metal buckle to select appropriate fit, Also available in S/M and L/XL sizes, Heavy duty stitching for prolonged use, Provides maximum back support when performing heavy lifts, XXL 4" leather weightlifting belt with integrated cushioned lumbar pad

node.usp1:
Layers of nylon and rigid padding create a comfortable and structured fit designed to complement and assist the muscles of the torso during training and in particular heavier lifts. The metal buckle combined with fold over Velcro® strap enables the wearer to achieve a finely tuned comfortable fit.

Belts are best when they are considered as a training aid, so rather than wearing it throughout your strength session put it on for the lifts that you feel you need extra support in the lower back. A belt is also useful for bracing the abdominal wall and creating intra-abdominal pressure. If your goal is simply lifting bigger weights rather than being 'functional', then chances are this belt will help you achieve those big lifts. Plus, a synthetic belt is preferred by many athletes as it is ready straight out of the box whereas a leather belt will mould and soften to your shape over time.

The 91 - 103cm adidas Nylon Weightlifting Belt features integrated internal fabric for extra comfort and its fully adjustable Velcro® closure ensures a snug and comfortable fit.
node.bulletpoints: 91 - 103cm (35"-40"), Also available in 3 further sizes: 96 - 108cm / 101 - 113cm / 106 - 116cm, Durable heavy duty metal fastening loop, Fully adjustable Velcro® closure ensures a snug and comfortable fit, Sturdy nylon weightlifting belt with added internal fabric for extra comfort

node.usp1:
Having a relatively light weight held close to your body won't have a radical effect on your muscles but if you place that weight a long way from your centre of gravity whilst working out then the effects really are noticeable.

These adjustable weighted ankle weights from adidas feature a super quick on/off Velcro® design so that they are both comfortable and practical. The soft material gives you a close fit but also ensures your movement isn't restricted when performing your key exercises.

Depending on your workout intensity preference, you can add 1kg of weight into each adidas ankle strap to work towards improving your stamina and strength.
node.bulletpoints: Adjustable ankle weights with 2 x 1kg removable weight packs, Adjustable Circumference : Minimum 20cm - Maximum 48cm, One size fits all, Velcro® fastening

node.usp1:

node.bulletpoints: Adjustable ankle weights with 2 x 2kg removable weight packs, Adjustable Circumference : Minimum 20cm - Maximum 48cm, One size fits all, Velcro® fastening

node.usp1:
The adidas Full Body Weight Vest is the weighted jacket of all jackets! With 10kg of weight spread evenly over your entire upper body, extra resistance is added to every move you make. Though if you wish to lessen the intensity, the weight inserts can be removed at your leisure via the numerous integrated zip pocket compartments.

The full length zip creates a snug fit while the elasticated buckle belt adds further grip and comfort. Lined with a soft material, the adidas Weight Vest can be worn directly against your skin or over the top of your workout apparel and the internal balanced weights are soft to mould to the shape of your upper body.

Though one size fits all, the adidas weighted jacket is flexible and can be personalised to suit you and your training preferences. It's breathable with a lined neck line and cut deep arm holes, allowing the shoulders and arms to move freely. Plus, it's machine washable.
node.bulletpoints: 10kg adidas Full Body Weight Vest in black, Adjustable 10kg weight across upper body - weights can be removed to personalise the fit, Full length zip and elasticated buckle belt for secure fit, Internal weights mould to your body shape. Weights include: 2 x 0.5kg, 4 x 1kg, 1 x 1.25kg and 1 x 2.5kg, Soft material lining enabling you to wear directly on skin or over the top of workout apparel

node.usp1:
Adding extra weight takes your sports training to the next level. The 3kg weight belt from adidas is fully adjustable using its buckle and features secure compartments and zip closure for small personal items.

The belt's neoprene design means your back is supported comfortably and provides added weight in a compact fashion.
node.bulletpoints: Fully adjustable adidas 3kg Weight Belt, Secure compartments with zip closure, Soft fabric and neoprene design for added comfort

node.usp1:
The adidas Weight Vest has been specifically designed to distribute the weight evenly across the torso whilst also enabling the wearer to move freely. It also incorporates a wide Velcro® waist belt so that it can easily be worn over layers of training apparel.

The weight modules of the vest are removable meaning you can vary the load depending on the purpose of the training session. Suitable for both high and low impact activity, the weighted vest is an easy way of adding intensity to both skeletal muscles and the demands upon the cardio respiratory system.
node.bulletpoints: Incorporated Velcro® waist belt to wear over layered apparel, One size fits all adidas Weight Vest, Removable weights (10 x 0.45kg)

node.usp1: Keep your lifting area neat and tidy with the adidas Weight Rack. Compact in design, the rack can be kept close to a wall out of the way and the solid steel construction assures your dumbbells are stored securely - so load them on when your weight lifting workout is done.
node.bulletpoints: 2 tier adidas dumbbell rack, Bookshelf style storage , space saving design, Heavy-duty steel construction, Stores up to 8 dumbbells of varying size

node.usp1:
Kettlebells are one of the oldest and most basic types of exercise dating back thousands of years; however the adidas design team has used the latest materials and innovative design features to bring them right up to date.

Unlike dumbbells, kettlebells are intended to be used at speed. The design of a kettlebell means that the bulk of the weight is offset from the handle. When you swing or lift the kettlebell, the inertia of the swing can make the weight feel 3-4 times heavier than it really is. In the adidas Kettlebell range are 4-24kg kettlebell weights, so select and use the heaviest kettlebell that you can safely swing.

Even on the smaller sizes of Kettlebell the handle is full size and the length of the grip area ensures the bell will sit comfortably on the forearm rather than on the wrist. Constructed with heavy duty iron, the bells have a flat base to sit firmly on the floor to perform a large number of exercise options, plus they look neat when lined up together.

Grip is extremely important for your safety, so hold the handle with your thumb and fingers in the curved section of the handle. The classic kettlebell exercise is the 'Swing' - this move has the fantastic effect of not only engaging muscles throughout your entire body but also to turning each fibre into a fat burning furnace!

Training with kettlebells is for you if you want to do a quick and effective workout. When you swing a kettlebell in front of you, it might look like it's a shoulder exercise, but actually 70% of the power is coming from your legs and buttocks.
node.bulletpoints: 4kg adidas Kettlebell, Available in 4, 8, 12, 16, 20 or 24kg, Balanced heavy duty iron construction, Improves endurance and boots cardio stamina, Wide handle for extra versatility and comfortable grip

node.usp1:
Take your Yoga practice to the next level.

The 2.5m blue Yoga strap from Reebok assists with performing different poses, allowing you to maintain proper alignment and strengthen your posture.

A strap can significantly help you to elongate your reach, safely extending your arms and legs to reach a new level of flexibility. For example, if you're just starting out and can't quite manage a full seated forward bend pose just yet, you can use the Reebok Yoga strap to ease you into the move, keeping your legs and spine straight whilst relaxing your back - the way it should be done.

The robust Yoga strap features a buckle which securely holds it in place. This is an extremely important benefit when trying out new or more difficult poses. When using the strap in these instances, you're less likely to overstretch your limbs or cause an injury.

All in all, the Reebok Yoga Strap is an ideal accessory for Yoga enthusiasts of all abilities.
node.bulletpoints: 2.5m, Assists with performing different poses allowing you to maintain proper alignment, Blue Yoga Strap, Robust buckle holds strap in place

node.usp1:
A Yoga strap for all mats.

The Reebok Yoga Mat Strap is a lightweight harness that easily fits any size mat. Simply pop the loops around the ends of your rolled mat and the strap will tighten as you pick up the carry handle.

Extremely easy to remove, the Yoga mat strap is ideal if you're on your way to Yoga class - and possibly a little late - as you simply loosen the carry strap, unroll your mat, and away you go!

Keeping a firm grip on your Yoga mat on the move, there'll be no need to put it inside a Yoga bag.
node.bulletpoints: Easy to attach and remove, Hands free carry strap, Lightweight harness fits any size mat, Yoga Mat Strap

node.usp1:
The Reebok Yoga Block - A Yoga prop for multiple uses.

A Yoga block can be used to facilitate many Yoga poses and acts as a handy helper for more challenging stretches and poses. You can move the lightweight Yoga block to the positions that best suit you and your practice level. The block basically brings the floor closer to you.

For instance, when performing your downward dog, you may find you can't quite reach the floor without the pose becoming uncomfortable. The Yoga block, measuring at 22.8 x 15.2 x 7.6cm can then be used to help train you in becoming more flexible, and able to reach the floor without using it.

Though there's more to the foam Reebok Yoga Block than stretching and balance assistance, it can also be used for general strength exercises, adding another level of intensity to your Yoga workout. The block is particularly useful in learning internal and external rotation moves. And, if you're performing restorative Yoga, practice designed to relax and restore your body, the blue Reebok Yoga block is good for that too.
node.bulletpoints: 22.8 x 15.2 x 7.6cm, Assists with balance and stretching exercises, Debossed Reebok logo, Made from lightweight EVA foam, Yoga Block

node.usp1:

A Yoga block can be used to facilitate many Yoga poses and acts as a handy helper for more challenging stretches and poses. You can move the lightweight Yoga block to the positions that best suit you and your practice level. The block basically brings the floor closer to you and its non-standard, 'cut-out' shape provides additional grip and stability, more so than your typical Yoga block.

When performing your downward dog, you may find you can't quite reach the floor without the pose becoming uncomfortable. The shaped Yoga block, measuring at 22.8 x 15.2 x 7.6cm can then be used to help train you in becoming more flexible, and able to reach the floor without using it.

Though there's more to the firm Reebok Yoga Block than stretching and balance assistance, it can also be used for general strength exercises, adding another level of intensity to your Yoga workout. The block is particularly useful in learning internal and external rotation moves. Plus, if you're performing restorative Yoga, practice designed to relax and restore your body, the green Reebok Yoga block is good for that too.
node.bulletpoints: 22.8 x 15.2 x 7.6cm, Lightweight, firm Yoga block that aids in a variety of poses, Shaped design provides additional grip and stability, Shaped Yoga Block

node.usp1:
Stylish yet practical protection for your Yoga mat.

Featuring an adjustable and comfortable shoulder strap, the stylish Reebok Yoga Tube Bag with blue and white design detailing is the ideal accessory for your Yoga practice to protect your mat.

With a zip pocket incorporated into the Yoga bag, you'll keep all of your small personal items such as your keys and phone safe. When Yoga practice is complete, simply pop in your mat, pull the drawstring closure and away you go.
node.bulletpoints: Adjustable shoulder strap, Drawstring closure, Drawstring Yoga Mat Bag, Stylish blue with white cross design, Zip pocket

node.usp1:
Perform your Yoga poses seamlessly with the Reebok Yoga mat.

Featuring a non-slip 'sticky' surface texture, stability and posture is easily maintained - especially when executing the more challenging one leg balance moves such as a standing split or the extended-hand-to-big-toe.

Whether you're a beginner or seasoned Yoga professional, you'll know that the thickness and quality of your Yoga mat is important in ensuring your hands and knees are cushioned throughout your practice, yet it needs to be easy to roll up and store away. Ticking all of those boxes, the 4mm thick cushioned Yoga mat from Reebok is the perfect choice.

The Yoga mat, 173 x 61cm in size, offers good balance and traction for every move, is abrasion resistant and comfy for your feet; not only that but it's easy to care for and a breeze to clean after use.

Material, thickness and texture are all important qualities to look for in a Yoga mat, but so too is colour and design, especially when you're seeking a mat that complements your Yoga attire! In an eye-catching and stylish blue shade, you're sure to be the envy of your Yoga class.
node.bulletpoints: 4mm thickness, 173 x 61cm, Comfortable cushion against hard surfaces, Easy to clean, Non-slip sticky texture to help you maintain pose, Yoga Mat from the Reebok Yoga Range
